          1
          
              get '/projects/:project_id/task_def_id/:task_definition_id/comments/:id' do
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          
          
                project = Project.find(params[:project_id])
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
                task_definition = project.unit.task_definitions.find(params[:task_definition_id])
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
          
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
                unless authorise? current_user, project, :get
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          
          
                  error!({ error: 'You cannot read the comments for this task' }, 403)
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
                end
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          
          
          
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          
          
                if project.has_task_for_task_definition? task_definition
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          
          
                  task = project.task_for_task_definition(task_definition)
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          
          
          
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          
          
                  comment = task.comments.find(params[:id])
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          
          
          
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          
          
                  error!({error: 'No attachment for this comment.'}, 404) unless ["audio", "image", "pdf"].include? comment.content_type
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          
          
          
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          
          
                  error!({error: 'File missing'}, 404) unless File.exists? comment.attachment_path
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          
          
          
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          
          
                  # Set return content type
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          
          
                  content_type comment.attachment_mime_type
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          
          
          
        
      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          
          
                  env['api.format'] = :binary
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          
          
          
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          
          
                  # mark as attachment
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          
          
                  if params[:as_attachment]
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          
          
                    header['Content-Disposition'] = "attachment; filename=#{comment.attachment_file_name}"
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          
          
                  end
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          
          
          
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          
          
                  # Work out what part to return
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          
          
                  file_size = File.size(comment.attachment_path)
        
      90. 
      
        
    90. 
          
          
                  begin_point = 0
        
      91. 
      
        
    91. 
          
          
                  end_point = file_size - 1
        
      92. 
      
        
    92. 
          
          
          
        
      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          
          
                  # Was it asked for just a part of the file?
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          
          
                  if request.headers['Range']
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          
          
                    # indicate partial content
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          
          
                    status 206
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          
          
          
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          
          
                    # extract part desired from the content
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          
          
                    if request.headers['Range'] =~ /bytes\=(\d+)\-(\d*)/
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          
          
                      begin_point = $1.to_i
        
      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          
          
                      end_point = $2.to_i if $2.present?
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          
          
                    end
        
      103. 
      
        
    103. 
          
          
          
        
      104. 
      
        
    104. 
          
          
                    end_point = file_size - 1 unless end_point < file_size - 1
        
      105. 
      
        
    105. 
          
          
                  end
        
      106. 
      
        
    106. 
          
          
          
        
      107. 
      
        
    107. 
          
          
                  # Return the requested content
        
      108. 
      
        
    108. 
          
          
                  content_length = end_point - begin_point + 1
        
      109. 
      
        
    109. 
          
          
                  header['Content-Range'] = "bytes #{begin_point}-#{end_point}/#{file_size}"
        
      110. 
      
        
    110. 
          
          
                  header['Content-Length'] = content_length.to_s
        
      111. 
      
        
    111. 
          
          
                  header['Accept-Ranges'] = 'bytes'
        
      112. 
      
        
    112. 
          
          
          
        
      113. 
      
        
    113. 
          
          
                  # Read the binary data and return
        
      114. 
      
        
    114. 
          
          
                  IO.binread(comment.attachment_path, content_length, begin_point)
        
      115. 
      
        
    115. 
          
          
                end
        
      116. 
      
        
    116. 
          
          
              end
        
      117. 
      
        
    117. 
          
          
          
        
      118.

          1
          
              desc 'Get the comments related to a task'

    120.

      123. 
      
        
    123.

      127. 
      
        
    127.

    128.

    129. 
          
          
          
        
      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          
          
                  comments = task.all_comments.order('created_at ASC')
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          
          
                  result = comments.map { |c| c.serialize(current_user) }          
        
      132.

    133.

                  result = []
        
      135.

      136.

    137.

    139.

              desc 'Delete a comment'

      162.

      163.

              post '/task_definitions/' do
        
      38.

      48.

                task_def = TaskDefinition.new(task_params)

                # Link in group set if specified
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          
          
                #
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          
          
                if params[:task_def][:group_set_id] && params[:task_def][:group_set_id] >= 0
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          
          
                  gs = GroupSet.find(params[:task_def][:group_set_id])
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          
          
                  task_def.group_set = gs if gs.unit == unit
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          
          
                end
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          
          
          
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          
          
                task_def.save!
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          
          
                task_def
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          
          
              end
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          
          
          
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          1
          
              desc 'Edits the given task definition'
        
      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          1
          
              params do
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          1
          
                requires :id, type: Integer, desc: 'The task id to edit'
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          1
          
                requires :task_def, type: Hash do
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          1
          
                  optional :unit_id,                  type: Integer,  desc: 'The unit to create the new task def for'
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          1
          
                  optional :name,                     type: String,   desc: 'The name of this task def'
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          1
          
                  optional :description,              type: String,   desc: 'The description of this task def'
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          1
          
                  optional :weighting,                type: Integer,  desc: 'The weighting of this task'
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          1
          
                  optional :target_grade,             type: Integer,  desc: 'Target grade for task'
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          1
          
                  optional :group_set_id,             type: Integer,  desc: 'Related group set'
        
      90. 
      
        
    90. 
          1
          
                  optional :start_date,               type: Date,     desc: 'The date when the task should be started'
        
      91. 
      
        
    91. 
          1
          
                  optional :target_date,              type: Date,     desc: 'The date when the task is due'
        
      92. 
      
        
    92. 
          1
          
                  optional :due_date,                 type: Date,     desc: 'The deadline date'
        
      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          1
          
                  optional :abbreviation,             type: String,   desc: 'The abbreviation of the task'
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          1
          
                  optional :restrict_status_updates,  type: Boolean,  desc: 'Restrict updating of the status to staff'
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          1
          
                  optional :upload_requirements,      type: String,   desc: 'Task file upload requirements'
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          1
          
                  optional :plagiarism_checks,        type: String,   desc: 'The list of checks to perform'
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          1
          
                  optional :plagiarism_warn_pct,      type: Integer,  desc: 'The percent at which to record and warn about plagiarism'
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          1
          
                  optional :is_graded,                type: Boolean,  desc: 'Whether or not this task definition is a graded task'
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          1
          
                  optional :max_quality_pts,          type: Integer,  desc: 'A range for quality points when quality is assessed'
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          
          
                end
        
      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          
          
              end
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          1
          
              put '/task_definitions/:id' do
        
      103. 
      
        
    103. 
          
          
                task_def = TaskDefinition.find(params[:id])
        
      104. 
      
        
    104. 
          
          
          
        
      105. 
      
        
    105. 
          
          
                unless authorise? current_user, task_def.unit, :add_task_def
        
      106. 
      
        
    106. 
          
          
                  error!({ error: 'Not authorised to create a task definition of this unit' }, 403)
        
      107. 
      
        
    107. 
          
          
                end
        
      108. 
      
        
    108. 
          
          
          
        
      109. 
      
        
    109. 
          
          
                task_params = ActionController::Parameters.new(params)
        
      110. 
      
        
    110. 
          
          
                                                          .require(:task_def)
        
      111. 
      
        
    111. 
          
          
                                                          .permit(
        
      112. 
      
        
    112. 
          
          
                                                            :unit_id,
        
      113. 
      
        
    113. 
          
          
                                                            :name,
        
      114. 
      
        
    114. 
          
          
                                                            :description,
        
      115. 
      
        
    115. 
          
          
                                                            :weighting,
        
      116. 
      
        
    116. 
          
          
                                                            :target_grade,
        
      117. 
      
        
    117. 
          
          
                                                            :start_date,
        
      118. 
      
        
    118. 
          
          
                                                            :target_date,
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          
          
                                                            :due_date,
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          
          
                                                            :abbreviation,
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          
          
                                                            :restrict_status_updates,
        
      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          
          
                                                            :upload_requirements,
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          
          
                                                            :plagiarism_checks,
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          
          
                                                            :plagiarism_warn_pct,
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          
          
                                                            :is_graded,
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          
          
                                                            :max_quality_pts
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          
          
                                                          )
        
      128. 
      
        
    128. 
          
          
          
        
      129. 
      
        
    129. 
          
          
                task_def.update!(task_params)
        
      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          
          
                #
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          
          
                # Link in group set if specified
        
      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          
          
                #
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          
          
                if params[:task_def][:group_set_id]
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          
          
                  if params[:task_def][:group_set_id] >= 0
        
      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          
          
                    gs = GroupSet.find(params[:task_def][:group_set_id])
        
      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          
          
                    if gs.unit == task_def.unit
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          
          
                      task_def.group_set = gs
        
      138. 
      
        
    138. 
          
          
                      task_def.save
        
      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          
          
                    end
        
      140. 
      
        
    140. 
          
          
                  else
        
      141. 
      
        
    141. 
          
          
                    task_def.group_set = nil
        
      142. 
      
        
    142. 
          
          
                    task_def.save
        
      143. 
      
        
    143. 
          
          
                  end
        
      144. 
      
        
    144. 
          
          
                end
        
      145. 
      
        
    145. 
          
          
          
        
      146. 
      
        
    146. 
          
          
                task_def
        
      147. 
      
        
    147. 
          
          
              end
        
      148. 
      
        
    148. 
          
          
          
        
      149. 
      
        
    149. 
          1
          
              desc 'Upload CSV of task definitions to the provided unit'

          1

      154.

      156.

                ensure_csv!(params[:file][:tempfile])
        
      157. 
      
        
    157. 
          
          
          
        
      158. 
      
        
    158. 
          
          
                unit = Unit.find(params[:unit_id])
        
      159.

      160.

              end
        
      167. 
      
        
    167.

          1

      172.

      181.

      182. 
      
        
    182. 
          
          
                unit.task_definitions_csv
        
      183. 
      
        
    183. 
          
          
              end
        
      184. 
      
        
    184. 
          
          
          
        
      185. 
      
        
    185. 
          1
          
              desc 'Delete a task definition'
        
      186. 
      
        
    186. 
          1

      187.

      188. 
      
        
    188.

      194. 
      
        
    194. 
          
          
              end
        
      195. 
      
        
    195. 
          
          
          
        
      196. 
      
        
    196. 
          1
          
              desc 'Upload the task sheet for a given task'
        
      197. 
      
        
    197. 
          1
          
              params do
        
      198. 
      
        
    198. 
          1
          
                requires :unit_id, type: Integer, desc: 'The related unit'
        
      199. 
      
        
    199. 
          1
          
                requires :task_def_id, type: Integer, desc: 'The related task definition'
        
      200. 
      
        
    200. 
          1
          
                requires :file, type: Rack::Multipart::UploadedFile, desc: 'The task sheet pdf'
        
      201. 
      
        
    201. 
          
          
              end
        
      202. 
      
        
    202. 
          1
          
              post '/units/:unit_id/task_definitions/:task_def_id/task_sheet' do
        
      203. 
      
        
    203. 
          1
          
                unit = Unit.find(params[:unit_id])
        
      204. 
      
        
    204. 
          
          
          
        
      205. 
      
        
    205. 
          1
          
                unless authorise? current_user, unit, :add_task_def
        
      206. 
      
        
    206. 
          
          
                  error!({ error: 'Not authorised to upload tasks of unit' }, 403)
        
      207. 
      
        
    207. 
          
          
                end
        
      208. 
      
        
    208. 
          
          
          
        
      209. 
      
        
    209. 
          1
          
                task_def = unit.task_definitions.find(params[:task_def_id])
        
      210. 
      
        
    210. 
          
          
          
        
      211. 
      
        
    211. 
          1
          
                file = params[:file]
        
      212. 
      
        
    212. 
          
          
          
        
      213. 
      
        
    213. 
          1
          
                unless FileHelper.accept_file(file, 'task sheet', 'document')
        
      214. 
      
        
    214. 
          
          
                  error!({ error: "'#{file.name}' is not a valid #{file.type} file" }, 403)
        
      215. 
      
        
    215. 
          
          
                end
        
      216. 
      
        
    216. 
          
          
          
        
      217. 
      
        
    217. 
          
          
                # Actually import...
        
      218. 
      
        
    218. 
          1
          
                task_def.add_task_sheet(file[:tempfile].path)
        
      219. 
      
        
    219. 
          
          
              end
        
      220. 
      
        
    220. 
          
          
          
        
      221. 
      
        
    221. 
          1
          
              desc 'Remove the task sheet for a given task'
        
      222. 
      
        
    222. 
          1
          
              params do
        
      223. 
      
        
    223. 
          1

      226. 
      
        
    226. 
          1
          
              delete '/units/:unit_id/task_definitions/:task_def_id/task_sheet' do

      239.

      246.

          1
          
              post '/units/:unit_id/task_definitions/:task_def_id/task_resources' do
        
      247. 
      
        
    247. 
          1
          
                unit = Unit.find(params[:unit_id])
        
      248. 
      
        
    248. 
          
          
          
        
      249. 
      
        
    249. 
          1
          
                unless authorise? current_user, unit, :add_task_def
        
      250.

      252. 
      
        
    252. 
          
          
          
        
      253. 
      
        
    253. 
          1
          
                task_def = unit.task_definitions.find(params[:task_def_id])
        
      254.

      255. 
      
        
    255. 
          1
          
                file_path = params[:file][:tempfile].path

          1

      258. 
      
        
    258. 
          
          
          
        
      259.

    302. 
          1
          
              desc 'Download the tasks related to a task definition'
        
      303.

          1

          1

      307. 
      
        
    307. 
          1
          
              get '/units/:unit_id/task_definitions/:task_def_id/tasks' do
        
      308. 
      
        
    308. 
          
          
                unit = Unit.find(params[:unit_id])
        
      309. 
      
        
    309. 
          
          
                unless authorise? current_user, unit, :provide_feedback
        
      310. 
      
        
    310. 
          
          
                  error!({ error: 'Not authorised to access tasks for this unit' }, 403)
        
      311. 
      
        
    311. 
          
          
                end
        
      312. 
      
        
    312. 
          
          
          
        
      313. 
      
        
    313. 
          
          
                unit.student_tasks
        
      314. 
      
        
    314. 
          
          
                    .joins(:project)
        
      315. 
      
        
    315. 
          
          
                    .joins(:task_status)
        
      316. 
      
        
    316.

          1
          
              desc 'Download the task sheet containing the details related to performing that task'

          1

    340. 
          1
          
              get '/units/:unit_id/task_definitions/:task_def_id/task_pdf' do
        
      341. 
      
        
    341. 
          
          
                unit = Unit.find(params[:unit_id])
        
      342. 
      
        
    342. 
          
          
                task_def = unit.task_definitions.find(params[:task_def_id])
        
      343. 
      
        
    343. 
          
          
          
        
      344. 
      
        
    344. 
          
          
                unless authorise? current_user, unit, :get_unit
        
      345. 
      
        
    345. 
          
          
                  error!({ error: 'Not authorised to download task details of unit' }, 403)
        
      346. 
      
        
    346. 
          
          
                end
        
      347. 
      
        
    347. 
          
          
          
        
      348. 
      
        
    348.

      349.

      351.

      352. 
      
        
    352.

                  filename = "FileNotFound.pdf"
        
      354. 
      
        
    354. 
          
          
                end
        
      355.

      356.

                if params[:as_attachment]

      362.

                File.read(path)

              desc 'Get a similarity match for a given task'
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          1
          
              get '/tasks/:id/similarity/:count' do
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
                unless authenticated?
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
                  error!({ error: "Not authorised to download details for task '#{params[:id]}'" }, 401)
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
                end
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
                task = Task.find(params[:id])
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
          
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
                unless authorise? current_user, task, :get_submission
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
                  error!({ error: "Not authorised to download details for task '#{params[:id]}'" }, 401)
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
                end
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
          
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
                match = params[:count].to_i % task.similar_to_count
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          
          
                if match < 0
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
                  error!({ error: 'Invalid match sequence, must be 0 or larger' }, 403)
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          
                end
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
          
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          
          
                match_link = task.plagiarism_match_links.order('created_at DESC')[match]
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
                return if match_link.nil?
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
          
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
                logger.debug "Plagiarism match link 1: #{match_link}"
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          
          
                other_match_link = match_link.other_party
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
                logger.debug "Plagiarism match link 2: #{other_match_link}"
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          
          
                output = FileHelper.path_to_plagarism_html(match_link)
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          
          
          
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          
          
                if output.nil? || !File.exist?(output)
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          
          
                  error!({ error: 'No files to download' }, 403)
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          
          
                end
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          
          
          
        
      74. 
      
        
    74.

      75.

      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          
          
                end
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          
          
          
        
      78.

      90.

          1
          
              desc 'Dismiss a similarity match for a given task'
        
      126.

          1

      129.

      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          1
          
              put '/tasks/:id/similarity/:count' do
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          
          
                unless authenticated?
        
      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          
          
                  error!({ error: "Not authorised to access this task '#{params[:id]}'" }, 401)
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          
          
                end
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          
          
                task = Task.find(params[:id])
        
      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          
          
          
        
      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          
          
                unless authorise? current_user, task, :delete_plagiarism
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          
          
                  error!({ error: "Not authorised to remove similarity for task '#{params[:id]}'" }, 401)
        
      138. 
      
        
    138. 
          
          
                end
        
      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          
          
          
        
      140. 
      
        
    140. 
          
          
                match = params[:count].to_i % task.similar_to_count
        
      141. 
      
        
    141. 
          
          
                if match < 0
        
      142. 
      
        
    142. 
          
          
                  error!({ error: 'Invalid match sequence, must be 0 or larger' }, 403)
        
      143. 
      
        
    143. 
          
          
                end
        
      144. 
      
        
    144. 
          
          
          
        
      145. 
      
        
    145. 
          
          
                match_link = task.plagiarism_match_links.order('created_at DESC')[match]
        
      146. 
      
        
    146. 
          
          
                return if match_link.nil?
        
      147. 
      
        
    147. 
          
          
          
        
      148. 
      
        
    148. 
          
          
                match_link = match_link.other_party if params[:other]
        
      149. 
      
        
    149. 
          
          
          
        
      150. 
      
        
    150. 
          
          
                logger.info "#{current_user.username} changing plagiarism: setting dismissed for #{task.task_definition.abbreviation} by #{task.student.username} to #{params[:dismissed]}"
        
      151. 
      
        
    151. 
          
          
          
        
      152. 
      
        
    152. 
          
          
                logger.debug "    plagiarism match link 1: #{match_link}"
        
      153. 
      
        
    153. 
          
          
          
        
      154. 
      
        
    154. 
          
          
                match_link.dismissed = params[:dismissed]
        
      155. 
      
        
    155. 
          
          
                match_link.save!
        
      156. 
      
        
    156. 
          
          
                match_link.dismissed
        
      157. 
      
        
    157. 
          
          
              end
        
      158. 
      
        
    158. 
          
          
          
        
      159. 
      
        
    159. 
          1
          
              desc 'Update a task using its related project and task definition'
        
      160. 
      
        
    160. 
          1
          
              params do
        
      161. 
      
        
    161. 
          
          
                # requires :id, type: Integer, desc: 'The project id to locate'

                # requires :task_definition_id, type: Integer, desc: 'The id of the task definition of the task to update in this project'
        
      163. 
      
        
    163. 
          1
          
                optional :trigger, type: String, desc: 'New status'
        
      164. 
      
        
    164. 
          1
          
                optional :include_in_portfolio, type: Boolean, desc: 'Indicate if this task should be in the portfolio'
        
      165.

          1
          
                optional :grade, type: Integer, desc: 'Grade value if task is a graded task (required if task definition is a graded task)'

          1
          
                optional :quality_pts, type: Integer, desc: 'Quality points value if task has quality assessment'
        
      167. 
      
        
    167. 
          
          
              end
        
      168. 
      
        
    168. 
          1
          
              put '/projects/:id/task_def_id/:task_definition_id' do
        
      169. 
      
        
    169. 
          
          
                project = Project.find(params[:id])
        
      170. 
      
        
    170. 
          
          
                grade = params[:grade]
        
      171. 
      
        
    171. 
          
          
                task_definition = project.unit.task_definitions.find(params[:task_definition_id])
        
      172. 
      
        
    172. 
          
          
                needs_upload_docs = !task_definition.upload_requirements.empty?
        
      173. 
      
        
    173. 
          
          
          
        
      174. 
      
        
    174. 
          
          
                # check the user can put this task
        
      175. 
      
        
    175. 
          
          
                if authorise? current_user, project, :make_submission
        
      176. 
      
        
    176. 
          
          
                  task = project.task_for_task_definition(task_definition)
        
      177. 
      
        
    177. 
          
          
          
        
      178. 
      
        
    178. 
          
          
                  # if trigger supplied...
        
      179. 
      
        
    179. 
          
          
                  unless params[:trigger].nil?
        
      180. 
      
        
    180. 
          
          
                    # Check if they should be using portfolio_evidence api
        
      181. 
      
        
    181. 
          
          
                    if needs_upload_docs && params[:trigger] == 'ready_to_mark'
        
      182. 
      
        
    182. 
          
          
                      error!({ error: 'Cannot set this task status to ready to mark without uploading documents.' }, 403)
        
      183. 
      
        
    183. 
          
          
                    end
        
      184. 
      
        
    184. 
          
          
          
        
      185. 
      
        
    185. 
          
          
                    if task.group_task? && !task.group
        
      186. 
      
        
    186. 
          
          
                      error!({ error: "This task requires a group. Ensure you are in a group for the unit's #{task.task_definition.group_set.name}" }, 403)
        
      187. 
      
        
    187. 
          
          
                    end
        
      188. 
      
        
    188. 
          
          
          
        
      189. 
      
        
    189. 
          
          
                    logger.info "#{current_user.username} assessing task #{task.id} to #{params[:trigger]}"
        
      190. 
      
        
    190. 
          
          
                    result = task.trigger_transition(trigger: params[:trigger], by_user: current_user, quality: params[:quality_pts])
        
      191. 
      
        
    191. 
          
          
                    if result.nil? && task.task_definition.restrict_status_updates
        
      192. 
      
        
    192. 
          
          
                      error!({ error: 'This task can only be updated by your tutor.' }, 403)
        
      193. 
      
        
    193. 
          
          
                    end
        
      194. 
      
        
    194. 
          
          
                  end
        
      195. 
      
        
    195. 
          
          
          
        
      196. 
      
        
    196. 
          
          
                  # if grade was supplied
        
      197. 
      
        
    197. 
          
          
                  unless grade.nil?
        
      198. 
      
        
    198. 
          
          
                    # try to grade the task
        
      199. 
      
        
    199. 
          
          
                    task.grade_task grade, self
        
      200. 
      
        
    200. 
          
          
                  end
        
      201. 
      
        
    201. 
          
          
          
        
      202. 
      
        
    202. 
          
          
                  # if include in portfolio supplied
        
      203. 
      
        
    203. 
          
          
                  unless params[:include_in_portfolio].nil?
        
      204. 
      
        
    204. 
          
          
                    task.include_in_portfolio = params[:include_in_portfolio]
        
      205. 
      
        
    205. 
          
          
                    task.save
        
      206. 
      
        
    206. 
          
          
                  end
        
      207. 
      
        
    207. 
          
          
          
        
      208. 
      
        
    208. 
          
          
                  TaskUpdateSerializer.new(task)
        
      209. 
      
        
    209.

          1

              get '/projects/:id/task_def_id/:task_definition_id/submission_details' do

    238. 
          
          
                # Get the project and task_definition based on uploaded details.
        
      239.

                project = Project.find(params[:id])
        
      240. 
      
        
    240. 
          
          
                task_definition = project.unit.task_definitions.find(params[:task_definition_id])

    241. 
          
          
          
        
      242. 
      
        
    242. 
          
          
                # check the user can put this task
        
      243.

      245. 
      
        
    245. 
          
          
                # ensure there can be a pdf...

                needs_upload_docs = !task_definition.upload_requirements.empty?

          1
          
              get '/projects/:id/task_def_id/:task_definition_id/submission_files' do
        
      272. 
      
        
    272. 
          
          
                # Get the project and task_definition based on uploaded details.
        
      273. 
      
        
    273. 
          
          
                project = Project.find(params[:id])
        
      274. 
      
        
    274. 
          
          
                task_definition = project.unit.task_definitions.find(params[:task_definition_id])
        
      275. 
      
        
    275. 
          
          
          
        
      276. 
      
        
    276. 
          
          
                # check the user can put this task
        
      277. 
      
        
    277. 
          
          
                error!(error: 'You do not have permission to read submissions for this project.') unless authorise? current_user, project, :get_submission
        
      278. 
      
        
    278. 
          
          
          
        
      279. 
      
        
    279. 
          
          
                # Get the actual task...
        
      280. 
      
        
    280. 
          
          
                task = project.task_for_task_definition(task_definition)
        
      281. 
      
        
    281. 
          
          
          
        
      282. 
      
        
    282. 
          
          
                # Find the file
        
      283. 
      
        
    283. 
          
          
                file_loc = FileHelper.zip_file_path_for_done_task(task)
        
      284. 
      
        
    284. 
          
          
          
        
      285. 
      
        
    285. 
          
          
                if file_loc.nil?
        
      286. 
      
        
    286. 
          
          
                  file_loc = Rails.root.join('public', 'resources', 'FileNotFound.pdf')
        
      287. 
      
        
    287. 
          
          
                  header['Content-Disposition'] = 'attachment; filename=FileNotFound.pdf'
        
      288. 
      
        
    288. 
          
          
                else
        
      289. 
      
        
    289. 
          
          
                  header['Content-Disposition'] = "attachment; filename=#{project.student.username}-#{task.task_definition.abbreviation}.zip"
        
      290. 
      
        
    290. 
          
          
                end
        
      291. 
      
        
    291. 
          
          
          
        
      292. 
      
        
    292. 
          
          
                # Set download headers...
        
      293. 
      
        
    293. 
          
          
                content_type 'application/octet-stream'
        
      294. 
      
        
    294. 
          
          
                env['api.format'] = :binary
        
      295. 
      
        
    295. 
          
          
          
        
      296. 
      
        
    296. 
          
          
                # Return the file data
        
      297. 
      
        
    297. 
          
          
                File.read(file_loc)
        
      298. 
      
        
    298. 
          
          
              end
        
      299. 
      
        
    299. 
          
          
            end
        
      300. 
      
        
    300. 
          
          
          end

          1

      83.

      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          
          
          
        
      85.

      88.

                unit_role_parameters = ActionController::Parameters.new(params)

      96. 
      
        
    96.

      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          
          
                end
        
      98.

      102.

          end
        
      104.

      115.

          1
          
                if unit_parameters[:start_date].nil?
        
      116. 
      
        
    116.

      117. 
      
        
    117. 
          
          
                  delta = start_date > Date.today ? 0 : 7
        
      118. 
      
        
    118. 
          
          
                  unit_parameters[:start_date] = start_date + delta
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          
          
                end
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          1
          
                if unit_parameters[:end_date].nil?
        
      121. 
      
        
    121.

      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          
          
                end

      64.

              end
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          1
          
              put '/users/:id' do
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          7
          
                change_self = (params[:id] == current_user.id)
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
          
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          7
          
                params[:receive_portfolio_notifications] = true if params.key?(:receive_portfolio_notifications) && params[:receive_portfolio_notifications].nil?

          7
          
                params[:receive_portfolio_notifications] = true if params.key?(:receive_feedback_notifications) && params[:receive_feedback_notifications].nil?

    70. 
          7
          
                params[:receive_portfolio_notifications] = true if params.key?(:receive_task_notifications) && params[:receive_task_notifications].nil?
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          
          
          
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          
          
                # can only modify if current_user.id is same as :id provided
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          
          
                # (i.e., user wants to update their own data) or if update_user token
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          7
          
                if change_self || (authorise? current_user, User, :update_user)
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          
          
          
        
      76.

          7
          
                  user = User.find(params[:id])
        
      77.

      78.

          7
          
                  user_parameters = ActionController::Parameters.new(params)
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          
          
                                                                .require(:user)
        
      80. 
      
        
    80.

      81.

      90.

      91. 
      
        
    91. 
          
          
                                                                )
        
      92. 
      
        
    92. 
          
          
          
        
      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          7
          
                  user.role = Role.student if user.role.nil?
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          7
          
                  old_role = user.role
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          
          
          
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          
          
                  # have to translate the system_role -> role
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          
          
                  # note we only let user_parameters role if we're actually *changing* the role
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          
          
                  # (i.e., not passing in the *same* role)
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          
          
                  #
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          
          
                  # You cannot change your own permissions
        
      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          
          
                  #
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          7
          
                  if !change_self && params[:user][:system_role] && old_role.id != Role.with_name(params[:user][:system_role]).id
        
      103. 
      
        
    103. 
          
          
                    user_parameters[:role] = params[:user][:system_role]
        
      104. 
      
        
    104. 
          
          
                  end
        
      105. 
      
        
    105. 
          
          
          
        
      106. 
      
        
    106. 
          
          
                  #
        
      107. 
      
        
    107. 
          
          
                  # Only allow change of role if current user has permissions to demote/promote the user to the new role
        
      108. 
      
        
    108. 
          
          
                  #
        
      109. 
      
        
    109. 
          7
          
                  if user_parameters[:role]
        
      110. 
      
        
    110. 
          
          
                    # work out if promoting or demoting
        
      111. 
      
        
    111. 
          
          
                    new_role = Role.with_name(user_parameters[:role])
        
      112. 
      
        
    112. 
          
          
          
        
      113. 
      
        
    113. 
          
          
                    if new_role.nil?
        
      114. 
      
        
    114. 
          
          
                      error!({ error: "No such role name #{user_parameters[:role]}" }, 403)
        
      115. 
      
        
    115. 
          
          
                    end
        
      116. 
      
        
    116. 
          
          
                    action = new_role.id > old_role.id ? :promote_user : :demote_user
        
      117. 
      
        
    117. 
          
          
          
        
      118. 
      
        
    118. 
          
          
                    # current user not authorised to peform action with new role?
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          
          
                    unless authorise? current_user, User, action, User.get_change_role_perm_fn, [ old_role.to_sym, new_role.to_sym ]
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          
          
                      error!({ error: "Not authorised to #{action} user with id=#{params[:id]} to #{new_role.name}" }, 403)
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          
          
                    end
        
      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          
          
                    # update :role to actual Role object rather than String type
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          
          
                    user_parameters[:role] = new_role
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          
          
                  end

            # desc "Retrieve tasks for a unit"
        
      21.

              unless authenticated?

      25.

      27.

    28. 
          
          
              unless authorise? current_user, unit, :provide_feedback
        
      29. 
      
        
    29.

      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
              end
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
          
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
              td = unit.task_definitions.find(params[:task_def_id])
        
      33.

              output_zip = unit.get_task_submissions_zip(current_user, td)
        
      35.

              error!({ error: 'No files to download' }, 403) if output_zip.nil?

              # Set download headers...

    40. 
          
          
              download_id = "#{Time.new.strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%m:%S')}-#{unit.code}-#{td.abbreviation}-#{current_user.username}-files"

    41. 
          
          
              download_id.gsub! /[\\\/]/, '-'
        
      42. 
      
        
    42.

      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
              # header['Content-Disposition'] = "attachment; filename=#{download_id}.zip"
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
              # env['api.format'] = :binary
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
          
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
              logger.debug "Downloading task for #{td.abbreviation} from #{output_zip.path}"
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
          
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
              send_file output_zip.path, content_type: 'application/octet-stream', disposition: "attachment; filename=#{download_id}.zip"
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
              output_zip.close
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
            rescue MyException => e
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
              render json: e.message, status: e.status
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
            end
        
      53.

            def csv_date_to_date(date)
        
      3. 
      
        
    3. 
          
          
              return if date.nil? || date.empty?
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          
          
              date = date.strip
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          
          
          
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          
          
              if date !~ /20\d\d\-\d{1,2}\-\d{1,2}$/ # Matches YYYY-mm-dd by default
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          
          
                if date =~ /\d{1,2}\-\d{1,2}\-20\d\d/ # Matches dd-mm-YYYY
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
                  date = date.split('-').reverse.join('-')
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
                elsif date =~ /\d{1,2}\/\d{1,2}\/20\d\d$/ # Matches dd/mm/YYYY
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          
          
                  date = date.split('/').reverse.join('-')
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
                elsif date =~ /\d{1,2}\/\d{1,2}\/\d\d$/ # Matches dd/mm/YY
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
                  date = "20#{date.split('/').reverse.join('-')}"
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
                elsif date =~ /\d{1,2}\-\d{1,2}\-\d\d$/ # Matches dd-mm-YY
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          
          
                  date = "20#{date.split('-').reverse.join('-')}"
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
                elsif date =~ /\d{1,2}\-\d{1,2}\-\d\d \d\d:\d\d:\d\d$/ # Matches dd-mm-YY hh:mm:ss
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
                  date = date.split(' ').first
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
                  date = "20#{date.split('-').reverse.join('-')}"
        
      18. 
      
        
    18.

      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
                  date = date.split(' ').first

    20.

      21. 
      
        
    21.

            def db_concat(*args)
        
      3. 
      
        
    3. 
          
          
              env = ENV['RAILS_ENV'] || 'development'
        
      4. 
      
        
    4.

      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          
          
              args.map! { |arg| arg.class == Symbol ? arg.to_s : arg }
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          
          
          
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          
          
              case adapter
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
              when :mysql, :mysql2
        
      9. 
      
        
    9.

      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          
          
              when :sqlserver
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
                args.join('+')

      14.

            end

          1
          
            def error(msg)
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
              puts msg
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
              super(msg)
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
            end
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
          end

            # Test if a file should be accepted based on an expected kind

            def accept_file(file, name, kind)
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          5
          
              valid = true
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
          
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          5
          
              case kind
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
              when 'image'
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          1
          
                accept = ['image/png', 'image/gif', 'image/bmp', 'image/tiff', 'image/jpeg', 'image/x-ms-bmp']
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
              when 'code'
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          1
          
                accept = ['text/x-pascal', 'text/x-c', 'text/x-c++', 'text/plain', 'text/', 'application/javascript, text/html',
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
                          'text/css', 'text/x-ruby', 'text/coffeescript', 'text/x-scss', 'application/json', 'text/xml', 'application/xml',
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          
          
                          'text/x-yaml', 'application/xml', 'text/x-typescript']
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
              when 'document'
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          1
          
                accept = [ # -- one day"application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.wordprocessingml.document",
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
                  # --"application/msword",
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
                  'application/pdf'
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
                ]
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          1
          
                valid = pdf_valid? file.tempfile.path
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
              when 'audio'
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          1
          
                accept = ['audio/', 'video/webm', 'application/ogg', 'application/octet-stream']
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
              when 'comment_attachment'
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          1
          
                accept = ['audio/', 'video/webm', 'application/ogg', 'image/', 'application/pdf', 'application/octet-stream']
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
              when 'video'
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
                accept = ['video/mp4']
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
              else
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
                logger.error "Unknown type '#{kind}' provided for '#{name}'"
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
                return false
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
              end
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
          
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          5
          
              mime_in_list?(file.tempfile.path, accept) && valid
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
            end
        
      42. 
      
        
    42.

            # Sanitize the passed in paths, and ensure each part is valid
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
            # Will kill things like ../ etc or spaces in paths
        
      46. 
      
        
    46.

      47.

          1
          
            def sanitized_path(*paths)
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          137
          
              safe_paths = paths.map do |path_name|
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          216
          
                path_name.strip.tap do |name|
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
                  # Finally, replace all non alphanumeric, underscore
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
                  # or periods with underscore
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          216
          
                  name.gsub! /[^\w\-]/, '_'
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
                end
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
              end
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
          
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          137
          
              File.join(safe_paths)
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
            end
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          
          
          
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
            #
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          
            # Sanitize the passed in filename -- should not include any path details
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
            #
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          1
          
            def sanitized_filename(filename)
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          66
          
              filename.strip.tap do |name|
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
                # NOTE: File.basename doesn't work right with Windows paths on Unix
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
                # get only the filename, not the whole path
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          66
          
                name.sub! /\A.*(\\|\/)/, ''
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
                # Finally, replace all non alphanumeric, underscore
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          
          
                # or periods with underscore
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          66
          
                name.gsub! /[^\w\.\-]/, '_'
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          
          
              end
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          
          
            end
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          
          
          
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          1
          
            def task_file_dir_for_unit(unit, create = true)
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          66
          
              file_server = Doubtfire::Application.config.student_work_dir
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          66
          
              dst = "#{file_server}/" # trust the server config and passed in type for paths
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          66
          
              dst << sanitized_path("#{unit.code}-#{unit.id}", 'TaskFiles') << '/'
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          
          
          
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          66
          
              FileUtils.mkdir_p dst if create && (!Dir.exist? dst)
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          
          
          
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          66
          
              dst
        
      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          
          
            end

            def student_group_work_dir(type, group_submission, task = nil, create = false)
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          
          
              return nil unless group_submission
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          
          
          
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          
          
              file_server = Doubtfire::Application.config.student_work_dir
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          
          
              dst = "#{file_server}/" # trust the server config and passed in type for paths
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          
          
          
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          
          
              group = group_submission.group
        
      90. 
      
        
    90. 
          
          
              return nil unless group
        
      91. 
      
        
    91. 
          
          
              unit = group.unit
        
      92. 
      
        
    92. 
          
          
          
        
      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          
          
              if type == :pdf
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          
          
                dst << sanitized_path("#{unit.code}-#{unit.id}", "Group-#{group.id}", type.to_s) << '/'
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          
          
              elsif type == :done
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          
          
                dst << sanitized_path("#{unit.code}-#{unit.id}", "Group-#{group.id}", type.to_s, group_submission.id.to_s) << '/'
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          
          
              elsif type == :plagarism
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          
          
                dst << sanitized_path("#{unit.code}-#{unit.id}", "Group-#{group.id}", type.to_s, group_submission.id.to_s) << '/'
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          
          
              else # new and in_process -- just have task id -- will link to group when done etc.
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          
          
                # Add task id to dst if we want task
        
      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          
          
                raise 'Unable to locate file!' if task.nil?
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          
          
                dst << "#{type}/#{task.id}/"
        
      103. 
      
        
    103. 
          
          
              end
        
      104. 
      
        
    104. 
          
          
          
        
      105. 
      
        
    105. 
          
          
              FileUtils.mkdir_p(dst) if create
        
      106. 
      
        
    106. 
          
          
              dst
        
      107. 
      
        
    107. 
          
          
            end

            def student_work_dir(type = nil, task = nil, create = true)
        
      114. 
      
        
    114. 
          8
          
              if task && task.group_task?
        
      115. 
      
        
    115. 
          
          
                dst = student_group_work_dir type, task.group_submission, task
        
      116. 
      
        
    116. 
          
          
              else
        
      117. 
      
        
    117. 
          8
          
                file_server = Doubtfire::Application.config.student_work_dir
        
      118. 
      
        
    118. 
          8
          
                dst = "#{file_server}/" # trust the server config and passed in type for paths
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          
          
          
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          8
          
                if !(type.nil? || task.nil?)
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          8

      122. 
      
        
    122.

      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          
          
                  elsif type == :done
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          3
          
                    dst << sanitized_path("#{task.project.unit.code}-#{task.project.unit.id}", task.project.student.username.to_s, type.to_s, task.id.to_s) << '/'
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          
          
                  elsif type == :plagarism
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          
          
                    dst << sanitized_path("#{task.project.unit.code}-#{task.project.unit.id}", task.project.student.username.to_s, type.to_s, task.id.to_s) << '/'
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          
          
                  elsif type == :comment
        
      128.

          2

      129. 
      
        
    129. 
          
          
                  else # new and in_process -- just have task id
        
      130. 
      
        
    130.

      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          3
          
                    dst << "#{type}/#{task.id}/"
        
      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          
          
                  end
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          
          
                elsif !type.nil?
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          
          
                  if [:in_process, :new].include? type
        
      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          
          
                    # Add task id to dst if we want task
        
      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          
          
                    dst << "#{type}/"
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          
          
                  else
        
      138. 
      
        
    138.

      139. 
      
        
    139.

      140.

            def comment_attachment_path(task_comment, attachment_extension)
