            def compress_image(path)
        
      167. 
      
        
    167. 
          
          
              return true if File.size?(path) < 500_000
        
      168. 
      
        
    168. 
          
          
          
        
      169. 
      
        
    169. 
          
          
              compress_folder = File.join(Dir.tmpdir, 'doubtfire', 'compress')
        
      170. 
      
        
    170. 
          
          
          
        
      171. 
      
        
    171. 
          
          
              FileUtils.mkdir compress_folder unless File.directory? compress_folder
        
      172. 
      
        
    172. 
          
          
          
        
      173. 
      
        
    173. 
          
          
              tmp_file = File.join(compress_folder, "#{File.dirname(path).split(File::Separator).last}-file#{File.extname(path)}")
        
      174. 
      
        
    174. 
          
          
              logger.debug "File helper has started compressing #{path} to #{tmp_file}..."
        
      175. 
      
        
    175. 
          
          
          
        
      176. 
      
        
    176. 
          
          
              begin
        
      177. 
      
        
    177. 
          
          
                exec = "convert -delete 1--1 -quiet -strip -density 72 -quality 85% -resize 2048x2048\\> \
        
      178. 
      
        
    178. 
          
          
                        \"#{path}\" \
        
      179. 
      
        
    179. 
          
          
                        \"#{tmp_file}\" >>/dev/null 2>>/dev/null"
        
      180. 
      
        
    180. 
          
          
          
        
      181. 
      
        
    181. 
          
          
                did_compress = system_try_within 40, 'compressing image using convert', exec
        
      182. 
      
        
    182. 
          
          
          
        
      183. 
      
        
    183. 
          
          
                FileUtils.mv tmp_file, path if did_compress
        
      184. 
      
        
    184. 
          
          
              ensure
        
      185. 
      
        
    185. 
          
          
                FileUtils.rm tmp_file if File.exist? tmp_file
        
      186. 
      
        
    186. 
          
          
              end
        
      187. 
      
        
    187. 
          
          
          
        
      188. 
      
        
    188. 
          
          
              did_compress
        
      189. 
      
        
    189. 
          
          
            end
        
      190. 
      
        
    190. 
          
          
          
        
      191. 
      
        
    191. 
          1
          
            def compress_image_to_dest(source, dest)
        
      192. 
      
        
    192. 
          1
          
              exec = "convert -delete 1--1 -quiet -strip -density 72 -quality 85% -resize 2048x2048\\> \
        
      193. 
      
        
    193. 
          
          
                      \"#{source}\" \
        
      194. 
      
        
    194. 
          
          
                      \"#{dest}\" >>/dev/null 2>>/dev/null"
        
      195. 
      
        
    195. 
          
          
          
        
      196. 
      
        
    196. 
          1
          
              did_compress = system_try_within 40, 'compressing image using convert', exec
        
      197. 
      
        
    197. 
          
          
            end
        
      198. 
      
        
    198. 
          
          
          
        
      199. 
      
        
    199. 
          1
          
            def compress_pdf(path, max_size = 2_500_000)
        
      200. 
      
        
    200. 
          
          
              # trusting path... as it needs to be replaced
        
      201. 
      
        
    201. 
          
          
              logger.debug "Compressing PDF #{path} (#{File.size?(path)} bytes) using GhostScript"
        
      202. 
      
        
    202. 
          
          
              # only compress things over max_size -- defaults to 2.5mb
        
      203. 
      
        
    203. 
          
          
              return if File.size?(path) < max_size
        
      204. 
      
        
    204. 
          
          
          
        
      205. 
      
        
    205. 
          
          
              begin
        
      206. 
      
        
    206. 
          
          
                tmp_file = File.join(Dir.tmpdir, 'doubtfire', 'compress', "#{File.dirname(path).split(File::Separator).last}-file.pdf")
        
      207. 
      
        
    207. 
          
          
                FileUtils.mkdir_p(File.join(Dir.tmpdir, 'doubtfire', 'compress'))
        
      208. 
      
        
    208. 
          
          
          
        
      209. 
      
        
    209. 
          
          
                exec = "gs -sDEVICE=pdfwrite \
        
      210. 
      
        
    210. 
          
          
                           -dCompatibilityLevel=1.3 \
        
      211. 
      
        
    211. 
          
          
                           -dDetectDuplicateImages=true \
        
      212. 
      
        
    212. 
          
          
                           -dPDFSETTINGS=/screen \
        
      213. 
      
        
    213. 
          
          
                           -dNOPAUSE \
        
      214. 
      
        
    214. 
          
          
                           -dBATCH \
        
      215. 
      
        
    215. 
          
          
                           -dQUIET \
        
      216. 
      
        
    216. 
          
          
                           -sOutputFile=\"#{tmp_file}\" \
        
      217. 
      
        
    217. 
          
          
                           \"#{path}\" \
        
      218. 
      
        
    218. 
          
          
                           >>/dev/null 2>>/dev/null"
        
      219. 
      
        
    219. 
          
          
          
        
      220. 
      
        
    220. 
          
          
                # try with ghostscript
        
      221. 
      
        
    221. 
          
          
                did_compress = system_try_within 30, 'compressing PDF using ghostscript', exec
        
      222. 
      
        
    222. 
          
          
          
        
      223. 
      
        
    223. 
          
          
                unless did_compress
        
      224. 
      
        
    224. 
          
          
                  logger.info "Failed to compress PDF #{path} using GhostScript. Trying with convert"
        
      225. 
      
        
    225. 
          
          
          
        
      226. 
      
        
    226. 
          
          
                  exec = "convert \"#{path}\" \
        
      227. 
      
        
    227. 
          
          
                          -compress Zip \
        
      228. 
      
        
    228. 
          
          
                          \"#{tmp_file}\" \
        
      229. 
      
        
    229. 
          
          
                          >>/dev/null 2>>/dev/null"
        
      230. 
      
        
    230. 
          
          
          
        
      231. 
      
        
    231. 
          
          
                  # try with convert
        
      232. 
      
        
    232. 
          
          
                  did_compress = system_try_within 40, 'compressing PDF using convert', exec
        
      233. 
      
        
    233. 
          
          
          
        
      234. 
      
        
    234. 
          
          
                  unless did_compress
        
      235. 
      
        
    235. 
          
          
                    logger.error "Failed to compress PDF #{path} using convert. Cannot compress this PDF. Command was:\n\t#{exec}"
        
      236. 
      
        
    236. 
          
          
                  end
        
      237. 
      
        
    237. 
          
          
                end
        
      238. 
      
        
    238. 
          
          
          
        
      239. 
      
        
    239. 
          
          
                FileUtils.mv tmp_file, path if did_compress
        
      240. 
      
        
    240. 
          
          
          
        
      241. 
      
        
    241. 
          
          
              rescue => e
        
      242. 
      
        
    242. 
          
          
                logger.error "Failed to compress PDF #{path}. Rescued with error:\n\t#{e.message}"
        
      243. 
      
        
    243. 
          
          
              end
        
      244. 
      
        
    244. 
          
          
          
        
      245. 
      
        
    245. 
          
          
              FileUtils.rm tmp_file if File.exist? tmp_file
        
      246. 
      
        
    246. 
          
          
            end
        
      247. 
      
        
    247. 
          
          
          
        
      248. 
      
        
    248. 
          
          
            #
        
      249. 
      
        
    249. 
          
          
            # Move files between stages - new -> in process -> done
        
      250. 
      
        
    250. 
          
          
            #
        
      251. 
      
        
    251. 
          1
          
            def move_files(from_path, to_path)
        
      252. 
      
        
    252. 
          
          
              # move into the new dir - and mv files to the in_process_dir
        
      253. 
      
        
    253. 
          
          
              pwd = FileUtils.pwd
        
      254. 
      
        
    254. 
          
          
              begin
        
      255. 
      
        
    255. 
          
          
                FileUtils.mkdir_p(to_path) unless Dir.exist? to_path
        
      256. 
      
        
    256. 
          
          
                Dir.chdir(from_path)
        
      257. 
      
        
    257. 
          
          
                FileUtils.mv Dir.glob('*'), to_path, force: true
        
      258. 
      
        
    258. 
          
          
                Dir.chdir(to_path)
        
      259. 
      
        
    259. 
          
          
                begin
        
      260. 
      
        
    260. 
          
          
                  # remove from_path as files are now "in process"
        
      261. 
      
        
    261. 
          
          
                  FileUtils.rm_r(from_path)
        
      262. 
      
        
    262. 
          
          
                rescue
        
      263. 
      
        
    263. 
          
          
                  logger.warn "failed to rm #{from_path}"
        
      264. 
      
        
    264. 
          
          
                end
        
      265. 
      
        
    265. 
          
          
              ensure
        
      266. 
      
        
    266. 
          
          
                if FileUtils.pwd != pwd
        
      267. 
      
        
    267. 
          
          
                  if Dir.exist? pwd
        
      268. 
      
        
    268. 
          
          
                    FileUtils.chdir(pwd)
        
      269. 
      
        
    269. 
          
          
                  else
        
      270. 
      
        
    270. 
          
          
                    FileUtils.chdir(student_work_dir)
        
      271. 
      
        
    271. 
          
          
                  end
        
      272. 
      
        
    272. 
          
          
                end
        
      273. 
      
        
    273. 
          
          
              end
        
      274. 
      
        
    274. 
          
          
            end
        
      275. 
      
        
    275. 
          
          
          
        
      276. 
      
        
    276. 
          
          
            #
        
      277. 
      
        
    277. 
          
          
            # Tests if a PDF is valid / corrupt
        
      278. 
      
        
    278. 
          
          
            #
        
      279. 
      
        
    279. 
          1
          
            def pdf_valid?(filename)
        
      280. 
      
        
    280. 
          
          
              # Scan last 1024 bytes for the EOF mark
        
      281. 
      
        
    281. 
          1
          
              return false unless File.exist? filename
        
      282. 
      
        
    282. 
          1
          
              File.open(filename) do |f|
        
      283. 
      
        
    283. 
          1
          
                f.seek -4096, IO::SEEK_END unless f.size <= 4096
        
      284. 
      
        
    284. 
          1
          
                f.read.include? '%%EOF'
        
      285. 
      
        
    285. 
          
          
              end
        
      286. 
      
        
    286. 
          
          
            end
        
      287. 
      
        
    287. 
          
          
          
        
      288. 
      
        
    288. 
          
          
            #
        
      289. 
      
        
    289. 
          
          
            # Copy a PDF into place
        
      290. 
      
        
    290. 
          
          
            #
        
      291. 
      
        
    291. 
          1
          
            def copy_pdf(file, dest_path)
        
      292. 
      
        
    292. 
          
          
              if pdf_valid? file
        
      293. 
      
        
    293. 
          
          
                compress_pdf(file)
        
      294. 
      
        
    294. 
          
          
                FileUtils.cp file, dest_path
        
      295. 
      
        
    295. 
          
          
                true
        
      296. 
      
        
    296. 
          
          
              else
        
      297. 
      
        
    297. 
          
          
                false
        
      298. 
      
        
    298. 
          
          
              end
        
      299. 
      
        
    299. 
          
          
            end
        
      300. 
      
        
    300. 
          
          
          
        
      301. 
      
        
    301. 
          
          
            #
        
      302. 
      
        
    302. 
          
          
            # Read the file and return its contents as a string
        
      303. 
      
        
    303. 
          
          
            #
        
      304. 
      
        
    304. 
          1
          
            def read_file_to_str(filename)
        
      305. 
      
        
    305. 
          
          
              result = ''
        
      306. 
      
        
    306. 
          
          
              f = File.open(filename, 'r')
        
      307. 
      
        
    307. 
          
          
              begin
        
      308. 
      
        
    308. 
          
          
                f.each_line do |line|
        
      309. 
      
        
    309. 
          
          
                  result += line
        
      310. 
      
        
    310. 
          
          
                end
        
      311. 
      
        
    311. 
          
          
              ensure
        
      312. 
      
        
    312. 
          
          
                f.close unless f.nil?
        
      313. 
      
        
    313. 
          
          
              end
        
      314. 
      
        
    314. 
          
          
              result
        
      315. 
      
        
    315. 
          
          
            end
        
      316. 
      
        
    316. 
          
          
          
        
      317. 
      
        
    317. 
          1
          
            def path_to_plagarism_html(match_link)
        
      318. 
      
        
    318. 
          
          
              to_dir = student_work_dir(:plagarism, match_link.task)
        
      319. 
      
        
    319. 
          
          
          
        
      320. 
      
        
    320. 
          
          
              File.join(to_dir, "link_#{match_link.other_task.id}.html")
        
      321. 
      
        
    321. 
          
          
            end
        
      322. 
      
        
    322. 
          
          
          
        
      323. 
      
        
    323. 
          
          
            #
        
      324. 
      
        
    324. 
          
          
            # Save the passed in html to a file.
        
      325. 
      
        
    325. 
          
          
            #
        
      326. 
      
        
    326. 
          1
          
            def save_plagiarism_html(match_link, html)
        
      327. 
      
        
    327. 
          
          
              File.open(path_to_plagarism_html(match_link), 'w') do |out_file|
        
      328. 
      
        
    328. 
          
          
                out_file.puts html
        
      329. 
      
        
    329. 
          
          
              end
        
      330. 
      
        
    330. 
          
          
            end
        
      331. 
      
        
    331. 
          
          
          
        
      332. 
      
        
    332. 
          
          
            #
        
      333. 
      
        
    333.

      334. 
      
        
    334. 
          
          
            #
        
      335. 
      
        
    335.

            def delete_plagarism_html(match_link)
        
      336. 
      
        
    336. 
          
          
              rm_file = path_to_plagarism_html(match_link)
        
      337. 
      
        
    337. 
          
          
              if File.exist? rm_file
        
      338. 
      
        
    338. 
          
          
                FileUtils.rm(rm_file)
        
      339. 
      
        
    339. 
          
          
                to_dir = student_work_dir(:plagarism, match_link.task)
        
      340. 
      
        
    340. 
          
          
          
        
      341. 
      
        
    341. 
          
          
                FileUtils.rm_rf(to_dir) if Dir[File.join(to_dir, '*.html')].count.zero?
        
      342. 
      
        
    342. 
          
          
              end
        
      343. 
      
        
    343. 
          
          
          
        
      344. 
      
        
    344. 
          
          
              self
        
      345. 
      
        
    345. 
          
          
            end
        
      346. 
      
        
    346. 
          
          
          
        
      347.

            def delete_group_submission(group_submission)
        
      348.

              pdf_file = PortfolioEvidence.final_pdf_path_for_group_submission(group_submission)

      350. 
      
        
    350. 
          
          
              FileUtils.rm pdf_file if File.exist? pdf_file
        
      351.

      352.

              done_file = zip_file_path_for_group_done_task(group_submission)

      354.

              self
        
      355.

            end
        
      356.

            def zip_file_path_for_group_done_task(group_submission)

    358. 
          
          
              zip_file = "#{student_group_work_dir(:done, group_submission)[0..-2]}.zip"
        
      359.

            end
        
      360. 
      
        
    360. 
          
          
          
        
      361. 
      
        
    361. 
          1
          
            def zip_file_path_for_done_task(task)
        
      362. 
      
        
    362. 
          
          
              zip_file = "#{student_work_dir(:done, task, false)[0..-2]}.zip"
        
      363. 
      
        
    363. 
          
          
            end
        
      364. 
      
        
    364. 
          
          
          
        
      365. 
      
        
    365. 
          
          
            #
        
      366. 
      
        
    366. 
          
          
            # Compress the done files for a student - includes cover page and work uploaded
        
      367. 
      
        
    367. 
          
          
            #
        
      368. 
      
        
    368. 
          1
          
            def compress_done_files(task)
        
      369. 
      
        
    369. 
          
          
              task_dir = student_work_dir(:done, task, false)
        
      370. 
      
        
    370. 
          
          
              zip_file = zip_file_path_for_done_task(task)
        
      371. 
      
        
    371. 
          
          
              return if zip_file.nil? || (!Dir.exist? task_dir)
        
      372. 
      
        
    372. 
          
          
          
        
      373. 
      
        
    373. 
          
          
              FileUtils.rm(zip_file) if File.exist? zip_file
        
      374. 
      
        
    374. 
          
          
          
        
      375. 
      
        
    375. 
          
          
              input_files = Dir.entries(task_dir).select { |f| (f =~ /^\d{3}\.(cover|document|code|image)/).zero? }
        
      376. 
      
        
    376. 
          
          
          
        
      377. 
      
        
    377. 
          
          
              Zip::File.open(zip_file, Zip::File::CREATE) do |zip|
        
      378. 
      
        
    378. 
          
          
                zip.mkdir task.id.to_s
        
      379. 
      
        
    379. 
          
          
                input_files.each do |in_file|
        
      380. 
      
        
    380. 
          
          
                  zip.add "#{task.id}/#{in_file}", "#{task_dir}#{in_file}"
        
      381. 
      
        
    381. 
          
          
                end
        
      382. 
      
        
    382. 
          
          
              end
        
      383. 
      
        
    383. 
          
          
          
        
      384. 
      
        
    384. 
          
          
              FileUtils.rm_rf(task_dir)
        
      385. 
      
        
    385. 
          
          
            end
        
      386. 
      
        
    386. 
          
          
          
        
      387. 
      
        
    387. 
          1
          
            def write_entries_to_zip(entries, disk_root_path, zip_root_path, path, zip)
        
      388. 
      
        
    388. 
          
          
              entries.each do |e|
        
      389. 
      
        
    389. 
          
          
                # puts "Adding entry #{e}"
        
      390. 
      
        
    390. 
          
          
                file_path = path == '' ? e : File.join(path, e)
        
      391. 
      
        
    391. 
          
          
                zip_file_path = zip_root_path == '' ? file_path : File.join(zip_root_path, file_path)
        
      392. 
      
        
    392. 
          
          
                disk_file_path = File.join(disk_root_path, file_path)
        
      393. 
      
        
    393. 
          
          
          
        
      394. 
      
        
    394. 
          
          
                if File.directory? disk_file_path
        
      395. 
      
        
    395. 
          
          
                  # puts "Making dir: #{zip_file_path} for #{disk_file_path}"
        
      396. 
      
        
    396. 
          
          
                  zip.mkdir(zip_file_path)
        
      397. 
      
        
    397. 
          
          
                  subdir = (Dir.entries(disk_file_path) - %w(. ..))
        
      398. 
      
        
    398. 
          
          
                  # puts "subdir: #{subdir}"
        
      399. 
      
        
    399. 
          
          
                  write_entries_to_zip(subdir, disk_root_path, zip_root_path, file_path, zip)
        
      400. 
      
        
    400. 
          
          
                else
        
      401. 
      
        
    401. 
          
          
                  # puts "Adding file: #{disk_file_path} -- #{File.exists? disk_file_path}"
        
      402. 
      
        
    402. 
          
          
                  zip.get_output_stream(zip_file_path) do |f|
        
      403. 
      
        
    403. 
          
          
                    f.puts(File.open(disk_file_path, 'rb').read)
        
      404. 
      
        
    404. 
          
          
                  end
        
      405. 
      
        
    405. 
          
          
                end
        
      406. 
      
        
    406. 
          
          
              end
        
      407. 
      
        
    407. 
          
          
            end
        
      408. 
      
        
    408. 
          
          
          
        
      409. 
      
        
    409. 
          1
          
            def recursively_add_dir_to_zip(zip, dir, zip_root_path)
        
      410. 
      
        
    410. 
          
          
              entries = Dir.entries(dir) - %w(. ..)
        
      411. 
      
        
    411. 
          
          
              zip.mkdir(zip_root_path)
        
      412. 
      
        
    412. 
          
          
              write_entries_to_zip(entries, dir, zip_root_path, '', zip)
        
      413. 
      
        
    413. 
          
          
            end
        
      414. 
      
        
    414. 
          
          
          
        
      415. 
      
        
    415. 
          
          
            #
        
      416. 
      
        
    416. 
          
          
            # Extract the files from the zip file for this tasks, and replace in new so that it is created
        
      417. 
      
        
    417. 
          
          
            #
        
      418. 
      
        
    418. 
          1
          
            def move_compressed_task_to_new(task)
        
      419. 
      
        
    419. 
          
          
              # student_work_dir(:new, task) # create task dir
        
      420. 
      
        
    420. 
          
          
              task.extract_file_from_done student_work_dir(:new), '*', ->(_task, to_path, name) { "#{to_path}#{name}" }
        
      421. 
      
        
    421. 
          
          
            end
        
      422. 
      
        
    422. 
          
          
          
        
      423. 
      
        
    423. 
          
          
            #
        
      424. 
      
        
    424. 
          
          
            # Ensure that the contents of a file appear to be valid UTF8, on retry convert to ASCII to ensure
        
      425. 
      
        
    425. 
          
          
            #
        
      426. 
      
        
    426. 
          1
          
            def ensure_utf8_code(output_filename, force_ascii)
        
      427. 
      
        
    427. 
          
          
              # puts "Converting #{output_filename} to utf8"
        
      428. 
      
        
    428. 
          
          
              tmp_filename = Dir::Tmpname.create( [ "new", ".code" ] ) { }
        
      429. 
      
        
    429. 
          
          
          
        
      430. 
      
        
    430. 
          
          
              # Convert to utf8 from read encoding
        
      431. 
      
        
    431. 
          
          
              if force_ascii
        
      432. 
      
        
    432. 
          
          
                `iconv -c -t ascii "#{output_filename}" > "#{tmp_filename}"`
        
      433. 
      
        
    433. 
          
          
              else
        
      434. 
      
        
    434. 
          
          
                `iconv -c -t UTF-8 "#{output_filename}" > "#{tmp_filename}"`
        
      435. 
      
        
    435. 
          
          
              end
        
      436. 
      
        
    436. 
          
          
          
        
      437. 
      
        
    437. 
          
          
              # Move into place
        
      438. 
      
        
    438. 
          
          
              FileUtils.mv(tmp_filename, output_filename)
        
      439. 
      
        
    439. 
          
          
            end
        
      440. 
      
        
    440. 
          
          
          
        
      441.

          # getting file MIME types

            def mime_type(file_path)

            def excel_to_csv(file, extn)
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
              ss = Roo::Spreadsheet.open(file, extension: extn)
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          
          
          
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
              File.unlink(file)
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
              File.write(file, ss.sheet(ss.sheets.first).to_csv)
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
            end
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
          
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          1
          
            def ensure_csv!(file_path)
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
              file_path = file_path.path if file_path.is_a?(Tempfile)
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
              type = mime_type(file_path)
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          
          
          
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
              # check mime is correct before uploading
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
              accept = ['text/', 'text/plain', 'text/csv', 'application/vnd.ms-excel', 'application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.spreadsheetml.sheet']
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
              unless type.start_with?(*accept)
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
                error!({ error: "File given is not a csv file - detected #{type}" }, 403)
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
              end
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
          
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
              # Convert xls files to csv...
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
              if type.start_with? 'application/vnd.ms-excel'
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
                excel_to_csv file_path, :xls
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
              elsif type.start_with? 'application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.spreadsheetml.sheet'
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
                excel_to_csv file_path, :xlsx
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
              end
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
            end
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
          
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          1
          
            def mime_in_list?(file, type_list)
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          6
          
              type = mime_type(file)
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
          
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
              # check mime is correct before uploading
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          6
          
              type.start_with?(*type_list)
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
            end
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
          
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          1
          
            def check_mime_against_list!(file, expect, type_list)
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          1
          
              unless mime_in_list?(file, type_list)
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
                error!({ error: "File given is not a #{expect} file - detected #{mime_type}" }, 403)
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
              end
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
            end

    app/helpers/timeout_helper.rb

    92.86 % covered

    14 relevant lines. 13 lines covered and 1 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
    1. 
          1
          
          module TimeoutHelper
        
      2. 
      
        
    2. 
          1
          
            extend LogHelper
        
      3. 
      
        
    3. 
          
          
          
        
      4. 
      
        
    4. 
          
          
            #
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          
          
            # Timeout operation
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          
          
            #
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          
          
            # Usage:
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
            #   try_within 30, "doing the thing" do
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
            #     long_operation()
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          
          
            #   end
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
            #
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          1
          
            def try_within(sec, timeout_message = 'operation')
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          1
          
              begin
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          2
          
                Timeout::timeout(sec) { yield }
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
              rescue
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
                logger.error "Timeout when #{timeout_message} after #{sec}s"
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
              end
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
            end
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
          
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
            #
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
            # Timeout system call
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          
          
            #
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
            # Usage:
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
            #   system_try_within 30, "doing the thing", "gs do.pdf the.pdf thing.pdf"
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
            #
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          1
          
            def system_try_within(sec, timeout_message, command)
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
              # shell script to kill command after timeout
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          1
          
              timeout_exec = Rails.root.join('lib', 'shell', 'timeout.sh')
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          1
          
              result = false
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          1
          
              try_within sec, timeout_message do
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          1
          
                result = system "#{timeout_exec} -t #{sec} nice -n 10 #{command}"
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
              end
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          1
          
              result
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
            end
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
          
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
            # Export functions as module functions
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          1
          
            module_function :try_within
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          1
          
            module_function :system_try_within
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
          end
        
      40.

            def task_feedback_ready(project, tasks)

    51.

    52. 
          
          
              email_with_name = %("#{@student.name}" <#{@student.email}>)

      55.

      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
            end

            def self.permissions

              # What can students do with groups?

                :get_members

            def ensure_no_submissions
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          
          
              return true if group_submissions.count.zero?
        
      69.

              errors[:base] << 'Cannot delete group while it has submissions.'
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          
          
              false

    71. 
          
          
            end
        
      72.

            def specific_permission_hash(role, perm_hash, _other)
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          
          
              result = perm_hash[role] unless perm_hash.nil?
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          
          
              if result && role == :student
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          
          
                result << :manage_group if group_set.allow_students_to_manage_groups
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          
          
                end
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          
          
              result
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          
          
            end
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          
          
          
        
      81.

          1
          
            def role_for(user)
        
      82.

              result = unit.role_for(user)

    83. 
          
          
              if result == Role.student
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          
          
                result = nil unless has_user user

    85. 
          
          
              end

            def has_user(user)

            def add_member(project)
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          
          
              gm = project.group_membership_for_groupset(group_set)
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          
          
          
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          
          
              if gm.nil?
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          
          
                gm = GroupMembership.create(group: self, project: project)
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          
          
              else
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          
          
                gm = GroupMembership.find(gm.id)
        
      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          
          
                gm.group = self
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          
          
              end

    104.

      107.

              gm

            end

          1
          
            def __different_project_composition__(contributors, gs)
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          
          
              logger.debug 'Starting checks'
        
      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          
          
              contributors.each do |contrib|
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          
          
                logger.debug "-- Checking #{contrib}"
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          
          
                return true unless gs.projects.include? contrib[:project]
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          
          
                return true unless contrib[:pct].to_i > 0
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          
          
              end
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          
          
              logger.debug "Checking #{contributors.count} == #{gs.projects.count}"
        
      128. 
      
        
    128. 
          
          
              contributors.count != gs.projects.count
        
      129. 
      
        
    129. 
          
          
            end
        
      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          
          
          
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          
          
            #
        
      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          
          
            # The submitter task is the user who submitted this group task.
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          
          
            #
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          
          
            # Creates a Group Submission
        
      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          
          
            # Locates other group members, and link to this submission.
        
      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          
          
            #   - contributors contains [ {project: ..., pct: ... } ]
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          
          
            #
        
      138. 
      
        
    138. 
          1
          
            def create_submission(submitter_task, notes, contributors)
        
      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          
          
              total = 0
        
      140. 
      
        
    140. 
          
          
              # check all members are in the same group
        
      141. 
      
        
    141. 
          
          
              contributors.each do |contrib|
        
      142. 
      
        
    142. 
          
          
                project = contrib[:project]
        
      143. 
      
        
    143. 
          
          
                pct = contrib[:pct].to_i
        
      144. 
      
        
    144. 
          
          
                pts = contrib[:pts].to_i
        
      145. 
      
        
    145. 
          
          
          
        
      146. 
      
        
    146. 
          
          
                if pct < 0
        
      147. 
      
        
    147. 
          
          
                  contrib[:pct] = 0
        
      148. 
      
        
    148. 
          
          
                else
        
      149. 
      
        
    149. 
          
          
                  total += pct
        
      150. 
      
        
    150. 
          
          
                end
        
      151. 
      
        
    151. 
          
          
          
        
      152. 
      
        
    152. 
          
          
                contrib[:pts] = 0 unless pts > 0
        
      153. 
      
        
    153. 
          
          
                contrib[:pts] = 5 unless pts < 5
        
      154. 
      
        
    154. 
          
          
          
        
      155. 
      
        
    155. 
          
          
                raise 'Not all contributions were from team members.' unless projects.include? project
        
      156. 
      
        
    156. 
          
          
              end
        
      157. 
      
        
    157. 
          
          
          
        
      158. 
      
        
    158. 
          
          
              # check for all group members
        
      159. 
      
        
    159. 
          
          
              raise 'Contributions missing for some group members' unless projects.count == contributors.count
        
      160. 
      
        
    160. 
          
          
          
        
      161. 
      
        
    161. 
          
          
              # check pct
        
      162. 
      
        
    162. 
          
          
              raise 'Contribution percentages are insufficient.' unless total >= 90
        
      163. 
      
        
    163. 
          
          
              raise 'Contribution percentages are excessive.' unless total <= 110
        
      164. 
      
        
    164. 
          
          
          
        
      165. 
      
        
    165. 
          
          
              # check group task
        
      166. 
      
        
    166. 
          
          
              raise 'Group submission only allowed for group tasks.' unless submitter_task.task_definition.group_set
        
      167. 
      
        
    167. 
          
          
              raise 'Group submission for wrong group for unit.' unless submitter_task.task_definition.group_set == group_set
        
      168. 
      
        
    168. 
          
          
          
        
      169. 
      
        
    169. 
          
          
              old_gs = submitter_task.group_submission
        
      170. 
      
        
    170. 
          
          
              gs = old_gs
        
      171. 
      
        
    171. 
          
          
              if gs.nil? || __different_project_composition__(contributors, gs)
        
      172. 
      
        
    172. 
          
          
                gs = GroupSubmission.create
        
      173. 
      
        
    173. 
          
          
                gs.task_definition = submitter_task.task_definition
        
      174. 
      
        
    174. 
          
          
              end
        
      175. 
      
        
    175. 
          
          
          
        
      176. 
      
        
    176. 
          
          
              gs.group = self
        
      177. 
      
        
    177. 
          
          
              gs.notes = notes
        
      178. 
      
        
    178. 
          
          
              gs.submitted_by_project = submitter_task.project
        
      179. 
      
        
    179. 
          
          
              gs.save!
        
      180. 
      
        
    180. 
          
          
          
        
      181. 
      
        
    181. 
          
          
              contributors.each do |contrib|
        
      182. 
      
        
    182. 
          
          
                project = contrib[:project]
        
      183. 
      
        
    183. 
          
          
                task = project.matching_task submitter_task
        
      184. 
      
        
    184. 
          
          
          
        
      185. 
      
        
    185. 
          
          
                if contrib[:pct].to_i > 0
        
      186. 
      
        
    186. 
          
          
                  task.group_submission = gs
        
      187. 
      
        
    187. 
          
          
                  task.contribution_pct = contrib[:pct]
        
      188. 
      
        
    188. 
          
          
                  task.contribution_pts = contrib[:pts]
        
      189. 
      
        
    189. 
          
          
                end
        
      190. 
      
        
    190. 
          
          
                task.save
        
      191. 
      
        
    191. 
          
          
              end
        
      192. 
      
        
    192. 
          
          
          
        
      193. 
      
        
    193. 
          
          
              if old_gs
        
      194. 
      
        
    194. 
          
          
                old_gs.reload
        
      195. 
      
        
    195. 
          
          
                old_gs.destroy! if old_gs.projects.count.zero?
        
      196. 
      
        
    196. 
          
          
              end
        
      197. 
      
        
    197. 
          
          
          
        
      198. 
      
        
    198. 
          
          
              # ensure that original task is reloaded... update will have effected a different object
        
      199. 
      
        
    199. 
          
          
              submitter_task.reload
        
      200. 
      
        
    200. 
          
          
              gs
        
      201. 
      
        
    201. 
          
          
            end
        
      202. 
      
        
    202. 
          
          
          
        
      203. 
      
        
    203. 
          1
          
            def limit_members_to_tutorial?
        
      204. 
      
        
    204. 
          
          
              group_set.keep_groups_in_same_class
        
      205. 
      
        
    205. 
          
          
            end
        
      206. 
      
        
    206. 
          
          
          
        
      207. 
      
        
    207. 
          1
          
            def must_be_in_same_tutorial
        
      208. 
      
        
    208. 
          
          
              if limit_members_to_tutorial?
        
      209. 
      
        
    209. 
          
          
                unless all_members_in_tutorial?
        
      210. 
      
        
    210. 
          
          
                  errors.add(:members, "must all be in the group's tutorial")
        
      211. 
      
        
    211. 
          
          
                end
        
      212. 
      
        
    212. 
          
          
              end
        
      213. 
      
        
    213. 
          
          
            end
        
      214. 
      
        
    214. 
          
          
          
        
      215. 
      
        
    215. 
          
          
            #
        
      216. 
      
        
    216. 
          
          
            # Check if all members are in this groups tutorial
        
      217. 
      
        
    217. 
          
          
            #
        
      218. 
      
        
    218. 
          1
          
            def all_members_in_tutorial?
        
      219. 
      
        
    219. 
          
          
              group_memberships.each do |member|
        
      220. 
      
        
    220. 
          
          
                return false unless !member.active || member.in_group_tutorial?(tutorial)
        
      221. 
      
        
    221. 
          
          
              end
        
      222.

              true

            def specific_permission_hash(role, perm_hash, _other)
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
              result = perm_hash[role] unless perm_hash.nil?

              result

            def propagate_transition(initial_task, trigger, by_user, quality)
        
      32.

              tasks.each do |task|

          class LearningOutcomeTaskLink < ActiveRecord::Base
        
      2. 
      
        
    2. 
          1
          
            belongs_to :task_definition

          1
          
            belongs_to :task

          1
          
            validates :learning_outcome, presence: true
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          1
          
            validate :ensure_relations_unique

    9.

          1
          
            def ensure_relations_unique
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
              return if learning_outcome.nil? || task_definition.nil?
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          
          
          
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
              if id.nil?
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
                related_links = LearningOutcomeTaskLink.where('task_definition_id = :task_definition_id AND learning_outcome_id = :learning_outcome_id', my_id: id, task_definition_id: task_definition.id, learning_outcome_id: learning_outcome.id)
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
              else
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
                related_links = LearningOutcomeTaskLink.where('id != :my_id AND task_definition_id = :task_definition_id AND learning_outcome_id = :learning_outcome_id', my_id: id, task_definition_id: task_definition.id, learning_outcome_id: learning_outcome.id)
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
              end
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
          
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
              if task.nil?
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          
          
                errors.add(:task_definition, 'already linked to this learning outcome') if related_links.where('task_id is NULL').count > 0
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
              else
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
                errors.add(:task, 'already linked to this learning outcome') if related_links.where('task_id = :task_id', task_id: task.id).count > 0
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
              end
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
            end
        
      27.

      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          1
          
            def self.export_task_alignment_to_csv(unit, source)
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
              CSV.generate do |row|
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
                row << %w(unit_code learning_outcome task_abbr rating description)
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
                source.task_outcome_alignments.each do |align|
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
                  row << [unit.code, align.learning_outcome.abbreviation, align.task_definition.abbreviation, align.rating, align.description]
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
                end
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
              end
        
      35.

            end

          class PlagiarismMatchLink < ActiveRecord::Base
        
      2. 
      
        
    2. 
          1
          
            include LogHelper
        
      3.

      4.

          1
          
            belongs_to :task
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          1
          
            belongs_to :other_task, class_name: 'Task'
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          
          
          
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          
          
            #
        
      8.

      9.

      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          1
          
            before_destroy do |match_link|
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
              begin
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
                if match_link.task.group_task?
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
                  other_tasks = match_link.task.group_submission.tasks.select { |t| t.id != match_link.task.id }
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          
          
          
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
                  other_tasks_using_file = other_tasks.select { |t| t.plagiarism_match_links.where(other_task_id: match_link.other_task_id).count > 0 }
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
                  FileHelper.delete_plagarism_html(match_link) unless other_tasks_using_file.count > 0
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
                else # individual... so can delete file
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
                  FileHelper.delete_plagarism_html(match_link)
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
                end
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
              rescue => e
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
                logger.error "Error deleting match link for task #{match_link.task.id}. Error: #{e.message}"
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          
          
              end
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
            end
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
          
        
      25.

            def self.process_new_to_pdf
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
              done = {}
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
              errors = {}

      29.

              # For each folder in new (i.e., queued folders to process) that matches appropriate name
        
      30. 
      
        
    30.

      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
                # rubocop:disable Style/NumericPredicate
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
                (f =~ /^\d+$/) == 0
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
                # rubocop:enable Style/NumericPredicate
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
              end
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
              new_root_dir.each do |folder_id|
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
                task = Task.find(folder_id)
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
          
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
                add_error = lambda do |message|
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
                  logger.error "Failed to process folder_id = #{folder_id}. #{message}"
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
          
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
                  if task
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
                    task.add_text_comment task.project.main_tutor, "**Automated Comment**: Something went wrong with your submission. Check the files and resubmit this task. #{message}"

    43. 
          
          
                    task.trigger_transition trigger: 'fix', by_user: task.project.main_tutor
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
          
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
                    errors[task.project] = [] if errors[task.project].nil?

    46. 
          
          
                    errors[task.project] << task
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
                  end
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
                end
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
          
        
      50.

      51.

      54.

      55. 
      
        
    55.

      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
                    done[task.project] << task
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
                  else
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          
          
                    add_error.call('Failed to convert your submission to pdf.')
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
                  end
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          
                rescue Exception => e
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
                  add_error.call(e.message.to_s)
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          
          
                end
        
      63.

      63.

              # What can nil users do with projects?
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          4
          
              nil_role_permissions = [
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
          
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          
          
              ]
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
          
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          
          
              # Return permissions hash
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          
          
              {
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          
          
                student: student_role_permissions,
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          
          
                tutor: tutor_role_permissions,
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          
          
                nil: nil_role_permissions
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          4
          
              }
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          
          
            end
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          
          
          
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          1
          
            def role_for(user)
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          4
          
              user_role(user)
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          
          
            end
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          
          
          
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          1
          
            scope :with_progress, lambda { |progress_types|
        
      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          
          
              where(progress: progress_types) unless progress_types.blank?
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          
          
            }
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          
          
          
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          1
          
            def self.for_user(user, include_inactive)
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          
          
              if include_inactive
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          
          
                where('projects.user_id = :user_id', user_id: user.id)
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          
          
              else
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          
          
                active_projects.where('projects.user_id = :user_id', user_id: user.id)
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          
          
              end
        
      90. 
      
        
    90. 
          
          
            end
        
      91. 
      
        
    91. 
          
          
          
        
      92. 
      
        
    92. 
          1
          
            def self.active_projects
        
      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          
          
              joins(:unit).where(enrolled: true).where('units.active = TRUE')
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          
          
            end
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          
          
          
        
      96. 
      
        
    96. 
          1
          
            def self.for_unit_role(unit_role)
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          
          
              active_projects.where(unit_id: unit_role.unit_id) if unit_role.is_teacher?
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          
          
            end
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          
          
          
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          
          
            #
        
      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          
          
            # Check to see if the student has a valid tutorial
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          
          
            #
        
      103. 
      
        
    103. 
          1
          
            def must_be_in_group_tutorials
        
      104. 
      
        
    104. 
          
          
              groups.each do |g|
        
      105. 
      
        
    105. 
          
          
                next unless g.limit_members_to_tutorial?
        
      106. 
      
        
    106. 
          
          
                next unless tutorial != g.tutorial
        
      107. 
      
        
    107. 
          
          
                if g.group_set.allow_students_to_manage_groups
        
      108. 
      
        
    108. 
          
          
                  # leave group
        
      109. 
      
        
    109. 
          
          
                  g.remove_member(self)
        
      110. 
      
        
    110. 
          
          
                else
        
      111. 
      
        
    111. 
          
          
                  errors.add(:groups, "require you to be in tutorial #{g.tutorial.abbreviation}")
        
      112. 
      
        
    112. 
          
          
                  break
        
      113. 
      
        
    113. 
          
          
                end
        
      114. 
      
        
    114. 
          
          
              end
        
      115. 
      
        
    115. 
          
          
            end
        
      116. 
      
        
    116. 
          
          
          
        
      117. 
      
        
    117. 
          1
          
            def log_details
        
      118. 
      
        
    118. 
          9
          
              "#{id} - #{student.name} (#{student.username}) #{unit.code}"
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          
          
            end
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          
          
          
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          1
          
            def task_outcome_alignments
        
      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          
          
              learning_outcome_task_links
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          
          
            end
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          
          
          
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          
          
            #
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          
          
            # Returns the email of the tutor, or the convenor if there is no tutor
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          
          
            #
        
      128. 
      
        
    128. 
          1
          
            def tutor_email
        
      129. 
      
        
    129. 
          
          
              tutor = main_tutor
        
      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          
          
              if tutor
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          
          
                tutor.email
        
      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          
          
              else
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          
          
                unit.convenor_email
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          
          
              end
        
      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          
          
            end
        
      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          
          
          
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          
          
            #
        
      138. 
      
        
    138. 
          
          
            # All "discuss" and "demonstrate" become complete
        
      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          
          
            #
        
      140. 
      
        
    140. 
          1
          
            def trigger_week_end(by_user)
        
      141. 
      
        
    141. 
          
          
              discuss_and_demonstrate_tasks.each { |task| task.trigger_transition(trigger: 'complete', by_user: by_user, bulk: true, quality: task.quality_pts) }
        
      142. 
      
        
    142. 
          
          
            end
        
      143. 
      
        
    143. 
          
          
          
        
      144. 
      
        
    144. 
          1
          
            def start
        
      145. 
      
        
    145. 
          2
          
              update_attribute(:started, true)
        
      146. 
      
        
    146. 
          
          
            end
        
      147. 
      
        
    147. 
          
          
          
        
      148. 
      
        
    148. 
          1
          
            def student
        
      149. 
      
        
    149. 
          34
          
              user
        
      150. 
      
        
    150. 
          
          
            end
        
      151. 
      
        
    151. 
          
          
          
        
      152. 
      
        
    152. 
          1
          
            def main_tutor
        
      153. 
      
        
    153. 
          7
          
              if tutorial
        
      154. 
      
        
    154. 
          7
          
                result = tutorial.tutor
        
      155. 
      
        
    155. 
          7
          
                result = main_convenor if result.nil?
        
      156. 
      
        
    156. 
          7
          
                result
        
      157. 
      
        
    157. 
          
          
              else
        
      158. 
      
        
    158. 
          
          
                main_convenor
        
      159. 
      
        
    159. 
          
          
              end
        
      160. 
      
        
    160. 
          
          
            end
        
      161. 
      
        
    161. 
          
          
          
        
      162. 
      
        
    162. 
          1
          
            def main_convenor
        
      163. 
      
        
    163. 
          
          
              unit.main_convenor
        
      164. 
      
        
    164. 
          
          
            end
        
      165. 
      
        
    165. 
          
          
          
        
      166. 
      
        
    166. 
          1
          
            def tutorial_abbr
        
      167. 
      
        
    167. 
          
          
              tutorial.abbreviation unless tutorial.nil?
        
      168. 
      
        
    168. 
          
          
            end
        
      169. 
      
        
    169. 
          
          
          
        
      170. 
      
        
    170. 
          1
          
            def user_role(user)
        
      171. 
      
        
    171. 
          5
          
              if user == student then :student
        
      172. 
      
        
    172. 
          2
          
              elsif user == main_tutor then :tutor
        
      173. 
      
        
    173. 
          
          
              elsif user.nil? then nil
        
      174. 
      
        
    174. 
          
          
              elsif unit.tutors.where(id: user.id).count != 0 then :tutor
        
      175. 
      
        
    175. 
          
          
              else nil
        
      176. 
      
        
    176. 
          
          
              end
        
      177. 
      
        
    177. 
          
          
            end
        
      178. 
      
        
    178. 
          
          
          
        
      179. 
      
        
    179. 
          1
          
            def active?
        
      180. 
      
        
    180. 
          
          
              unit.active
        
      181. 
      
        
    181. 
          
          
            end
        
      182. 
      
        
    182. 
          
          
          
        
      183. 
      
        
    183. 
          
          
            #
        
      184. 
      
        
    184. 
          
          
            # Get a string representation of the Target Grade
        
      185. 
      
        
    185. 
          
          
            #
        
      186. 
      
        
    186. 
          1
          
            def target_grade_desc
        
      187. 
      
        
    187. 
          
          
              case target_grade
        
      188. 
      
        
    188. 
          
          
              when 1
        
      189. 
      
        
    189. 
          
          
                'Credit'
        
      190. 
      
        
    190. 
          
          
              when 2
        
      191. 
      
        
    191. 
          
          
                'Distinction'
        
      192. 
      
        
    192. 
          
          
              when 3
        
      193. 
      
        
    193. 
          
          
                'High Distinction'
        
      194. 
      
        
    194. 
          
          
              else
        
      195. 
      
        
    195. 
          
          
                'Pass'
        
      196. 
      
        
    196. 
          
          
              end
        
      197. 
      
        
    197. 
          
          
            end
        
      198. 
      
        
    198. 
          
          
          
        
      199. 
      
        
    199. 
          1
          
            def reference_date
        
      200. 
      
        
    200. 
          
          
              if application_reference_date > unit.end_date
        
      201. 
      
        
    201. 
          
          
                unit.end_date
        
      202. 
      
        
    202. 
          
          
              else
        
      203. 
      
        
    203. 
          
          
                application_reference_date
        
      204. 
      
        
    204. 
          
          
              end
        
      205. 
      
        
    205. 
          
          
            end
        
      206. 
      
        
    206. 
          
          
          
        
      207. 
      
        
    207. 
          1
          
            def task_details_for_shallow_serializer(user)
        
      208. 
      
        
    208. 
          
          
              tasks
        
      209. 
      
        
    209. 
          
          
                .joins(:task_status)
        
      210. 
      
        
    210. 
          
          
                .joins("LEFT JOIN task_comments ON task_comments.task_id = tasks.id")
        
      211. 
      
        
    211. 
          
          
                .joins("LEFT JOIN comments_read_receipts crr ON crr.task_comment_id = task_comments.id AND crr.user_id = #{user.id}")
        
      212. 
      
        
    212. 
          
          
                .select(
        
      213. 
      
        
    213. 
          
          
                  'SUM(case when crr.user_id is null AND NOT task_comments.id is null then 1 else 0 end) as number_unread', 'project_id', 'tasks.id as id',
        
      214. 
      
        
    214. 
          
          
                  'task_definition_id', 'task_statuses.id as status_id',
        
      215. 
      
        
    215. 
          
          
                  'completion_date', 'times_assessed', 'submission_date', 'portfolio_evidence', 'tasks.grade as grade', 'quality_pts', 'include_in_portfolio', 'grade'
        
      216. 
      
        
    216. 
          
          
                )
        
      217. 
      
        
    217. 
          
          
                .group(
        
      218. 
      
        
    218. 
          
          
                  'task_statuses.id', 'tasks.project_id', 'tasks.id', 'task_definition_id', 'status_id',
        
      219. 
      
        
    219. 
          
          
                  'completion_date', 'times_assessed', 'submission_date', 'portfolio_evidence', 'grade', 'quality_pts',
        
      220. 
      
        
    220. 
          
          
                  'include_in_portfolio', 'grade'
        
      221. 
      
        
    221. 
          
          
                )
        
      222. 
      
        
    222. 
          
          
                .map do |r|
        
      223. 
      
        
    223. 
          
          
                  t = Task.find(r.id)
        
      224. 
      
        
    224. 
          
          
                  {
        
      225. 
      
        
    225. 
          
          
                    id: r.id,
        
      226. 
      
        
    226. 
          
          
                    status: TaskStatus.find(r.status_id).status_key,
        
      227. 
      
        
    227. 
          
          
                    task_definition_id: r.task_definition_id,
        
      228. 
      
        
    228. 
          
          
                    include_in_portfolio: r.include_in_portfolio,
        
      229. 
      
        
    229. 
          
          
                    pct_similar: t.pct_similar,
        
      230. 
      
        
    230. 
          
          
                    similar_to_count: t.similar_to_count,
        
      231. 
      
        
    231. 
          
          
                    similar_to_dismissed_count: t.similar_to_dismissed_count,
        
      232. 
      
        
    232. 
          
          
                    times_assessed: r.times_assessed,
        
      233. 
      
        
    233. 
          
          
                    grade: r.grade,
        
      234. 
      
        
    234. 
          
          
                    quality_pts: r.quality_pts,
        
      235. 
      
        
    235. 
          
          
                    num_new_comments: r.number_unread,
        
      236. 
      
        
    236. 
          
          
                    extensions: t.extensions,
        
      237. 
      
        
    237.
