    1699. 
          
          
                # end
        
      1700. 
      
        
    1700. 
          
          
              end
        
      1701. 
      
        
    1701. 
          
          
          
        
      1702. 
      
        
    1702. 
          
          
              result['all'] = _ilo_progress_summary(data.values.reduce(:+))
        
      1703. 
      
        
    1703. 
          
          
          
        
      1704. 
      
        
    1704. 
          
          
              result
        
      1705. 
      
        
    1705. 
          
          
            end
        
      1706. 
      
        
    1706. 
          
          
          
        
      1707. 
      
        
    1707. 
          1
          
            def ilo_progress_class_stats
        
      1708. 
      
        
    1708. 
          
          
              temp = student_ilo_progress_stats.values
        
      1709. 
      
        
    1709. 
          
          
          
        
      1710. 
      
        
    1710. 
          
          
              return {} if temp.nil?
        
      1711. 
      
        
    1711. 
          
          
          
        
      1712. 
      
        
    1712. 
          
          
              data = temp.reduce(:+)
        
      1713. 
      
        
    1713. 
          
          
          
        
      1714. 
      
        
    1714. 
          
          
              _ilo_progress_summary(data)
        
      1715. 
      
        
    1715. 
          
          
            end
        
      1716. 
      
        
    1716. 
          
          
          
        
      1717. 
      
        
    1717. 
          1
          
            def student_grades_csv
        
      1718. 
      
        
    1718. 
          
          
              students_with_grades = active_projects.where('grade > 0')
        
      1719. 
      
        
    1719. 
          
          
          
        
      1720. 
      
        
    1720. 
          
          
              CSV.generate do |row|
        
      1721. 
      
        
    1721. 
          
          
                row << %w(unit_code username student_id grade rationale)
        
      1722. 
      
        
    1722. 
          
          
                students_with_grades.each do |project|
        
      1723. 
      
        
    1723. 
          
          
                  row << [project.unit.code, project.student.username, project.student.student_id, project.grade, project.grade_rationale]
        
      1724. 
      
        
    1724. 
          
          
                end
        
      1725. 
      
        
    1725. 
          
          
              end
        
      1726. 
      
        
    1726. 
          
          
            end
        
      1727. 
      
        
    1727. 
          
          
          
        
      1728. 
      
        
    1728. 
          
          
            # Used to calculate the number of assessment each tutor has performed
        
      1729. 
      
        
    1729. 
          1
          
            def tutor_assessment_csv(options = {})
        
      1730. 
      
        
    1730. 
          
          
              CSV.generate(options) do |csv|
        
      1731. 
      
        
    1731. 
          
          
                csv << [
        
      1732. 
      
        
    1732. 
          
          
                  'Username',
        
      1733. 
      
        
    1733. 
          
          
                  'Tutor Name',
        
      1734. 
      
        
    1734. 
          
          
                  'Total Tasks Assessed'
        
      1735. 
      
        
    1735. 
          
          
                ]
        
      1736. 
      
        
    1736. 
          
          
          
        
      1737. 
      
        
    1737. 
          
          
                tasks
        
      1738. 
      
        
    1738. 
          
          
                  .joins(project: [ { tutorial: { unit_role: :user } } ])
        
      1739. 
      
        
    1739. 
          
          
                  .select('users.username', 'users.first_name', 'users.last_name', 'SUM(times_assessed) AS total')
        
      1740. 
      
        
    1740. 
          
          
                  .group('users.username', 'users.first_name', 'users.last_name')
        
      1741. 
      
        
    1741. 
          
          
                  .each do |r|
        
      1742. 
      
        
    1742. 
          
          
                    csv << [ r.username, "#{r.first_name} #{r.last_name}", r.total ]
        
      1743. 
      
        
    1743. 
          
          
                  end
        
      1744. 
      
        
    1744. 
          
          
              end
        
      1745. 
      
        
    1745. 
          
          
            end
        
      1746. 
      
        
    1746. 
          
          
          
        
      1747. 
      
        
    1747. 
          
          
            #----------------------------------------------------------------------------
        
      1748. 
      
        
    1748. 
          
          
            # Task updates from offline download/upload
        
      1749. 
      
        
    1749. 
          
          
            #----------------------------------------------------------------------------
        
      1750. 
      
        
    1750. 
          
          
          
        
      1751. 
      
        
    1751. 
          
          
            #
        
      1752. 
      
        
    1752. 
          
          
            # Defines the csv headers for batch download
        
      1753. 
      
        
    1753. 
          
          
            #
        
      1754. 
      
        
    1754. 
          1
          
            def mark_csv_headers
        
      1755. 
      
        
    1755. 
          
          
              "Username,Name,Tutorial,Task,Student's Last Comment,Your Last Comment,Status,New Grade,New Quality,Max Quality,New Comment"
        
      1756. 
      
        
    1756. 
          
          
            end
        
      1757. 
      
        
    1757. 
          
          
          
        
      1758. 
      
        
    1758. 
          1
          
            def check_mark_csv_headers
        
      1759. 
      
        
    1759. 
          
          
              'Username,Name,Tutorial,Task,Status,New Grade,New Quality,New Comment'
        
      1760. 
      
        
    1760. 
          
          
            end
        
      1761. 
      
        
    1761. 
          
          
          
        
      1762. 
      
        
    1762. 
          1
          
            def readme_text
        
      1763. 
      
        
    1763. 
          
          
              path = Rails.root.join('public', 'resources', 'marking_package_readme.txt')
        
      1764. 
      
        
    1764. 
          
          
              File.read path
        
      1765. 
      
        
    1765. 
          
          
            end
        
      1766. 
      
        
    1766. 
          
          
          
        
      1767. 
      
        
    1767. 
          
          
            #
        
      1768. 
      
        
    1768. 
          
          
            # Generates a download package of the given tasks
        
      1769. 
      
        
    1769. 
          
          
            #
        
      1770. 
      
        
    1770. 
          1
          
            def generate_batch_task_zip(user, tasks)
        
      1771. 
      
        
    1771. 
          
          
              # Reject all tasks not for this unit...
        
      1772. 
      
        
    1772. 
          
          
              tasks = tasks.reject { |task| task.project.unit.id != id }
        
      1773. 
      
        
    1773. 
          
          
          
        
      1774. 
      
        
    1774. 
          
          
              download_id = "#{Time.new.strftime('%Y-%m-%d')}-#{code}-#{user.username}"
        
      1775. 
      
        
    1775. 
          
          
              filename = FileHelper.sanitized_filename("batch_ready_to_mark_#{user.username}.zip")
        
      1776. 
      
        
    1776. 
          
          
              output_zip = Tempfile.new(filename)
        
      1777. 
      
        
    1777. 
          
          
          
        
      1778. 
      
        
    1778. 
          
          
              # Create a new zip
        
      1779. 
      
        
    1779. 
          
          
              Zip::File.open(output_zip.path, Zip::File::CREATE) do |zip|
        
      1780. 
      
        
    1780. 
          
          
                csv_str = mark_csv_headers
        
      1781. 
      
        
    1781. 
          
          
          
        
      1782. 
      
        
    1782. 
          
          
                # Add individual tasks...
        
      1783. 
      
        
    1783. 
          
          
                tasks.select { |t| t.group_submission.nil? }.each do |task|
        
      1784. 
      
        
    1784. 
          
          
                  # Skip tasks that do not yet have a PDF generated
        
      1785. 
      
        
    1785. 
          
          
                  next if task.processing_pdf?
        
      1786. 
      
        
    1786. 
          
          
          
        
      1787. 
      
        
    1787. 
          
          
                  # Add to the template entry string
        
      1788. 
      
        
    1788. 
          
          
                  student = task.project.student
        
      1789. 
      
        
    1789. 
          
          
                  mark_col = if task.status == :need_help
        
      1790. 
      
        
    1790. 
          
          
                               'need_help'
        
      1791. 
      
        
    1791. 
          
          
                             else
        
      1792. 
      
        
    1792. 
          
          
                               'rtm'
        
      1793. 
      
        
    1793. 
          
          
                             end
        
      1794. 
      
        
    1794. 
          
          
          
        
      1795. 
      
        
    1795. 
          
          
                  csv_str << "\n#{student.username.tr(',', '_')},#{student.name.tr(',', '_')},#{task.project.tutorial.abbreviation},#{task.task_definition.abbreviation.tr(',', '_')},\"#{task.last_comment_by(task.project.student).gsub(/"/, '""')}\",\"#{task.last_comment_by(user).gsub(/"/, '""')}\",#{mark_col},,,#{task.task_definition.max_quality_pts},"
        
      1796. 
      
        
    1796. 
          
          
          
        
      1797. 
      
        
    1797. 
          
          
                  src_path = task.portfolio_evidence
        
      1798. 
      
        
    1798. 
          
          
          
        
      1799. 
      
        
    1799. 
          
          
                  next if src_path.nil? || src_path.empty?
        
      1800. 
      
        
    1800. 
          
          
                  next unless File.exist? src_path
        
      1801. 
      
        
    1801. 
          
          
          
        
      1802. 
      
        
    1802. 
          
          
                  # make dst path of "<student id>/<task abbrev>.pdf"
        
      1803. 
      
        
    1803. 
          
          
                  dst_path = FileHelper.sanitized_path(task.project.student.username.to_s, "#{task.task_definition.abbreviation}-#{task.id}") + '.pdf'
        
      1804. 
      
        
    1804. 
          
          
                  # now copy it over
        
      1805. 
      
        
    1805. 
          
          
                  zip.add(dst_path, src_path)
        
      1806. 
      
        
    1806. 
          
          
                end
        
      1807. 
      
        
    1807. 
          
          
          
        
      1808. 
      
        
    1808. 
          
          
                # Add group tasks...
        
      1809. 
      
        
    1809. 
          
          
                tasks.select(&:group_submission).group_by(&:group_submission) .each do |subm, tasks|
        
      1810. 
      
        
    1810. 
          
          
                  task = tasks.first
        
      1811. 
      
        
    1811. 
          
          
                  # Skip tasks that do not yet have a PDF generated
        
      1812. 
      
        
    1812. 
          
          
                  next if task.processing_pdf?
        
      1813. 
      
        
    1813. 
          
          
          
        
      1814. 
      
        
    1814. 
          
          
                  # Add to the template entry string
        
      1815. 
      
        
    1815. 
          
          
                  grp = task.group
        
      1816. 
      
        
    1816. 
          
          
                  next if grp.nil?
        
      1817. 
      
        
    1817. 
          
          
                  csv_str << "\nGRP_#{grp.id}_#{subm.id},#{grp.name.tr(',', '_')},#{grp.tutorial.abbreviation},#{task.task_definition.abbreviation.tr(',', '_')},\"#{task.last_comment_not_by(user).gsub(/"/, '""')}\",\"#{task.last_comment_by(user).gsub(/"/, '""')}\",rtm,,#{task.task_definition.max_quality_pts},"
        
      1818. 
      
        
    1818. 
          
          
          
        
      1819. 
      
        
    1819. 
          
          
                  src_path = task.portfolio_evidence
        
      1820. 
      
        
    1820. 
          
          
          
        
      1821. 
      
        
    1821. 
          
          
                  next if src_path.nil? || src_path.empty?
        
      1822. 
      
        
    1822. 
          
          
                  next unless File.exist? src_path
        
      1823. 
      
        
    1823. 
          
          
          
        
      1824. 
      
        
    1824. 
          
          
                  # make dst path of "<student id>/<task abbrev>.pdf"
        
      1825. 
      
        
    1825. 
          
          
                  dst_path = FileHelper.sanitized_path(grp.name.to_s, "#{task.task_definition.abbreviation}-#{task.id}") + '.pdf'
        
      1826. 
      
        
    1826. 
          
          
                  # now copy it over
        
      1827. 
      
        
    1827. 
          
          
                  zip.add(dst_path, src_path)
        
      1828. 
      
        
    1828. 
          
          
                end
        
      1829. 
      
        
    1829. 
          
          
          
        
      1830. 
      
        
    1830. 
          
          
                # Add marking file
        
      1831. 
      
        
    1831. 
          
          
                zip.get_output_stream('marks.csv') { |f| f.puts csv_str }
        
      1832. 
      
        
    1832. 
          
          
          
        
      1833. 
      
        
    1833. 
          
          
                # Add readme file
        
      1834. 
      
        
    1834. 
          
          
                zip.get_output_stream('readme.txt') { |f| f.puts readme_text }
        
      1835. 
      
        
    1835. 
          
          
              end
        
      1836. 
      
        
    1836. 
          
          
              output_zip
        
      1837. 
      
        
    1837. 
          
          
            end
        
      1838. 
      
        
    1838. 
          
          
          
        
      1839. 
      
        
    1839. 
          
          
            #
        
      1840. 
      
        
    1840. 
          
          
            # Update the tasks status from the csv and email students
        
      1841. 
      
        
    1841. 
          
          
            #
        
      1842. 
      
        
    1842. 
          1
          
            def update_task_status_from_csv(user, csv_str, success, _ignored, errors)
        
      1843. 
      
        
    1843. 
          
          
              done = {}
        
      1844. 
      
        
    1844. 
          
          
              # Remove \r -- causes issues with CSV parsing (assume windows \r\n format if present)
        
      1845. 
      
        
    1845. 
          
          
              csv_str.encode!('UTF-8', 'binary', invalid: :replace, undef: :replace, replace: '')
        
      1846. 
      
        
    1846. 
          
          
              csv_str.tr!("\r", "\n")
        
      1847. 
      
        
    1847. 
          
          
              csv_str.gsub!("\n\n", "\n")
        
      1848. 
      
        
    1848. 
          
          
          
        
      1849. 
      
        
    1849. 
          
          
              valid_header = true
        
      1850. 
      
        
    1850. 
          
          
          
        
      1851. 
      
        
    1851. 
          
          
              # read data from CSV
        
      1852. 
      
        
    1852. 
          
          
              CSV.parse(csv_str, headers: true, return_headers: true,
        
      1853. 
      
        
    1853. 
          
          
                                 header_converters: [->(body) { body.encode!('UTF-8', 'binary', invalid: :replace, undef: :replace, replace: '').downcase unless body.nil? }],
        
      1854. 
      
        
    1854. 
          
          
                                 converters: [->(body) { body.encode!('UTF-8', 'binary', invalid: :replace, undef: :replace, replace: '') unless body.nil? }]).each do |task_entry|
        
      1855. 
      
        
    1855. 
          
          
                group = nil
        
      1856. 
      
        
    1856. 
          
          
          
        
      1857. 
      
        
    1857. 
          
          
                # check the header row
        
      1858. 
      
        
    1858. 
          
          
                if task_entry.header_row?
        
      1859. 
      
        
    1859. 
          
          
                  # find these headers...
        
      1860. 
      
        
    1860. 
          
          
                  check_mark_csv_headers.split(',').each do |expect_header|
        
      1861. 
      
        
    1861. 
          
          
                    expect_header.encode!('UTF-8', 'binary', invalid: :replace, undef: :replace, replace: '').downcase!
        
      1862. 
      
        
    1862. 
          
          
                    unless task_entry.to_hash.keys.include? expect_header
        
      1863. 
      
        
    1863. 
          
          
                      errors << { row: task_entry, message: "Missing header '#{expect_header}', ensure first row has header information." }
        
      1864. 
      
        
    1864. 
          
          
                      return false
        
      1865. 
      
        
    1865. 
          
          
                    end
        
      1866. 
      
        
    1866. 
          
          
                  end
        
      1867. 
      
        
    1867. 
          
          
                  # go to the next row if the headers are ok
        
      1868. 
      
        
    1868. 
          
          
                  next
        
      1869. 
      
        
    1869. 
          
          
                end
        
      1870. 
      
        
    1870. 
          
          
          
        
      1871. 
      
        
    1871. 
          
          
                # Find the related task definition
        
      1872. 
      
        
    1872. 
          
          
                td = task_definitions.select { |td| td.abbreviation.tr(',', '_') == task_entry['task'] }.first
        
      1873. 
      
        
    1873. 
          
          
                if td.nil?
        
      1874. 
      
        
    1874. 
          
          
                  errors << { row: task_entry, message: "Unable to find task with abbreviation #{task_entry['task']}" }
        
      1875. 
      
        
    1875. 
          
          
                  next
        
      1876. 
      
        
    1876. 
          
          
                end
        
      1877. 
      
        
    1877. 
          
          
          
        
      1878. 
      
        
    1878. 
          
          
                task = nil
        
      1879. 
      
        
    1879. 
          
          
                related_tasks = nil
        
      1880. 
      
        
    1880. 
          
          
          
        
      1881. 
      
        
    1881. 
          
          
                # get the task...
        
      1882. 
      
        
    1882. 
          
          
                if td.is_group_task?
        
      1883. 
      
        
    1883. 
          
          
                  unless task_entry['username'] =~ /GRP_\d+_\d+/
        
      1884. 
      
        
    1884. 
          
          
                    errors << { row: task_entry, message: 'Group username is in the wrong format.' }
        
      1885. 
      
        
    1885. 
          
          
                    next
        
      1886. 
      
        
    1886. 
          
          
                  end
        
      1887. 
      
        
    1887. 
          
          
                  # its a group submission... so find task from group submission
        
      1888. 
      
        
    1888. 
          
          
                  group_details = /GRP_(\d+)_(\d+)/.match(task_entry['username'])
        
      1889. 
      
        
    1889. 
          
          
          
        
      1890. 
      
        
    1890. 
          
          
                  subm = GroupSubmission.find_by(id: group_details[2].to_i)
        
      1891. 
      
        
    1891. 
          
          
                  if subm.nil?
        
      1892. 
      
        
    1892. 
          
          
                    errors << { row: task_entry, message: 'Unable to find original submission for group task.' }
        
      1893. 
      
        
    1893. 
          
          
                    next
        
      1894. 
      
        
    1894. 
          
          
                  end
        
      1895. 
      
        
    1895. 
          
          
          
        
      1896. 
      
        
    1896. 
          
          
                  task = subm.submitter_task
        
      1897. 
      
        
    1897. 
          
          
                  if task.nil?
        
      1898. 
      
        
    1898. 
          
          
                    errors << { row: task_entry, message: 'Unable to find original submission for group task.' }
        
      1899. 
      
        
    1899. 
          
          
                    next
        
      1900. 
      
        
    1900. 
          
          
                  end
        
      1901. 
      
        
    1901. 
          
          
          
        
      1902. 
      
        
    1902. 
          
          
                  group = Group.find(group_details[1].to_i)
        
      1903. 
      
        
    1903. 
          
          
                  if group.id != task.group.id
        
      1904. 
      
        
    1904. 
          
          
                    errors << { row: task_entry, message: "Group mismatch (expected task #{td.abbreviation} to match #{task.group.name})" }
        
      1905. 
      
        
    1905. 
          
          
                    next
        
      1906. 
      
        
    1906. 
          
          
                  end
        
      1907. 
      
        
    1907. 
          
          
          
        
      1908. 
      
        
    1908. 
          
          
                  related_tasks = subm.tasks
        
      1909. 
      
        
    1909. 
          
          
                  owner_text = group.name
        
      1910. 
      
        
    1910. 
          
          
                else
        
      1911. 
      
        
    1911. 
          
          
                  # its an individual task... so find from the project
        
      1912. 
      
        
    1912. 
          
          
                  project = projects.joins(:user).where('users.username' => task_entry['username']).first
        
      1913. 
      
        
    1913. 
          
          
                  if project.nil?
        
      1914. 
      
        
    1914. 
          
          
                    errors << { row: task_entry, message: 'Unable to find student project for this task.' }
        
      1915. 
      
        
    1915. 
          
          
                    next
        
      1916. 
      
        
    1916. 
          
          
                  end
        
      1917. 
      
        
    1917. 
          
          
          
        
      1918. 
      
        
    1918. 
          
          
                  task = project.task_for_task_definition(td)
        
      1919. 
      
        
    1919. 
          
          
                  if task.nil?
        
      1920. 
      
        
    1920. 
          
          
                    errors << { row: task_entry, message: "Unable to find task for #{task_entry['task']} not found" }
        
      1921. 
      
        
    1921. 
          
          
                    next
        
      1922. 
      
        
    1922. 
          
          
                  end
        
      1923. 
      
        
    1923. 
          
          
          
        
      1924. 
      
        
    1924. 
          
          
                  related_tasks = [ task ]
        
      1925. 
      
        
    1925. 
          
          
                  owner_text = project.user.name
        
      1926. 
      
        
    1926. 
          
          
                end
        
      1927. 
      
        
    1927. 
          
          
          
        
      1928. 
      
        
    1928. 
          
          
                unless AuthorisationHelpers.authorise? user, task, :put
        
      1929. 
      
        
    1929. 
          
          
                  errors << { row: task_entry, error: 'You do not have permission to assess this task.' }
        
      1930. 
      
        
    1930. 
          
          
                  next
        
      1931. 
      
        
    1931. 
          
          
                end
        
      1932. 
      
        
    1932. 
          
          
          
        
      1933. 
      
        
    1933. 
          
          
                begin
        
      1934. 
      
        
    1934. 
          
          
                  task.trigger_transition(trigger: task_entry['status'], by_user: user, quality: task_entry['new quality'].to_i) # saves task
        
      1935. 
      
        
    1935. 
          
          
                  task.grade_task(task_entry['new grade']) # try to grade task if need be
        
      1936. 
      
        
    1936. 
          
          
          
        
      1937. 
      
        
    1937. 
          
          
                  if !(task_entry['new comment'].nil? || task_entry['new comment'].empty?)
        
      1938. 
      
        
    1938. 
          
          
                    task.add_text_comment user, task_entry['new comment']
        
      1939. 
      
        
    1939. 
          
          
                    success << { row: task_entry, message: "Updated task #{task.task_definition.abbreviation} for #{owner_text}" }
        
      1940. 
      
        
    1940. 
          
          
                    success << { row: {}, message: "Added comment to #{task.task_definition.abbreviation} for #{owner_text}" }
        
      1941. 
      
        
    1941. 
          
          
                  else
        
      1942. 
      
        
    1942. 
          
          
                    success << { row: task_entry, message: "Updated task #{task.task_definition.abbreviation} for #{owner_text}" }
        
      1943. 
      
        
    1943. 
          
          
                  end
        
      1944. 
      
        
    1944. 
          
          
                rescue Exception => e
        
      1945. 
      
        
    1945. 
          
          
                  errors << { row: task_entry, message: e.message }
        
      1946. 
      
        
    1946. 
          
          
                  next
        
      1947. 
      
        
    1947. 
          
          
                end
        
      1948. 
      
        
    1948. 
          
          
          
        
      1949. 
      
        
    1949. 
          
          
                related_tasks.each do |task|
        
      1950. 
      
        
    1950. 
          
          
                  # add to done projects for emailing
        
      1951. 
      
        
    1951. 
          
          
                  done[task.project] = [] if done[task.project].nil?
        
      1952. 
      
        
    1952. 
          
          
                  done[task.project] << task
        
      1953. 
      
        
    1953. 
          
          
                end
        
      1954. 
      
        
    1954. 
          
          
              end
        
      1955. 
      
        
    1955. 
          
          
          
        
      1956. 
      
        
    1956. 
          
          
              # send emails...
        
      1957. 
      
        
    1957. 
          
          
              begin
        
      1958. 
      
        
    1958. 
          
          
                done.each do |project, tasks|
        
      1959. 
      
        
    1959. 
          
          
                  logger.info "Checking feedback email for project #{project.id}"
        
      1960. 
      
        
    1960. 
          
          
                  if project.student.receive_feedback_notifications
        
      1961. 
      
        
    1961. 
          
          
                    logger.info "Emailing feedback notification to #{project.student.name}"
        
      1962. 
      
        
    1962. 
          
          
                    PortfolioEvidenceMailer.task_feedback_ready(project, tasks).deliver
        
      1963. 
      
        
    1963. 
          
          
                  end
        
      1964. 
      
        
    1964. 
          
          
                end
        
      1965. 
      
        
    1965. 
          
          
              rescue => e
        
      1966. 
      
        
    1966. 
          
          
                logger.error "Failed to send emails from feedback submission. Rescued with error: #{e.message}"
        
      1967.

              end
        
      1968.

      1969. 
      
        
    1969. 
          
          
              true

            # Uploads a batch package back into doubtfire

          1
          
            def upload_batch_task_zip_or_csv(user, file)
        
      1976. 
      
        
    1976. 
          
          
              success = []
        
      1977. 
      
        
    1977. 
          
          
              errors = []
        
      1978. 
      
        
    1978. 
          
          
              ignored = []
        
      1979.

      1980.

      1982. 
      
        
    1982.

      1983.

      1984. 
      
        
    1984. 
          
          
              unless mime_in_list?(file.tempfile.path, accept)
        
      1985. 
      
        
    1985.

      1987. 
      
        
    1987.

      1988.

      1990.

      1995. 
      
        
    1995. 
          
          
              else
        
      1996. 
      
        
    1996. 
          
          
                # files are extracted to a temp dir first
        
      1997. 
      
        
    1997. 
          
          
                i = 0
        
      1998.

      2003.

      2040.

      2043.

      2044.

                    zip.each do |file|
        
      2045. 
      
        
    2045. 
          
          
                      # Skip processing marking file
        
      2046.

      2052.

      2053.

      2054.

      2055.

      2057.

      2058. 
      
        
    2058.

      2059. 
      
        
    2059. 
          
          
          
        
      2060. 
      
        
    2060. 
          
          
                      # Extract the id from the filename
        
      2061.

                      task_id_from_filename = File.basename(file.name, '.pdf').split('-').last
        
      2062. 
      
        
    2062. 
          
          
                      task = Task.find_by(id: task_id_from_filename)
        
      2063. 
      
        
    2063. 
          
          
                      if task.nil?
        
      2064. 
      
        
    2064. 
          
          
                        ignored << { row: "File #{file.name}", message: 'Unable to find associated task.' }
        
      2065. 
      
        
    2065.

      2066. 
      
        
    2066. 
          
          
                      end
        
      2067.

                      if task_entry.nil?

      2073.

      2074. 
      
        
    2074.

      2075.

      2076.

      2079. 
      
        
    2079.

      2080. 
      
        
    2080. 
          
          
          
        
      2081.

      2084.

      2085. 
      
        
    2085. 
          
          
                      end
        
      2086. 
      
        
    2086. 
          
          
          
        
      2087. 
      
        
    2087.

      2089.

      2090.

            def send_weekly_status_emails(summary_stats)
        
      2125. 
      
        
    2125. 
          
          
          
        
      2126. 
      
        
    2126. 
          
          
              summary_stats[:unit] = self
        
      2127. 
      
        
    2127. 
          
          
              summary_stats[:unit_week_comments] = comments.where("task_comments.created_at > :start AND task_comments.created_at < :end", start: summary_stats[:week_start], end: summary_stats[:week_end]).count
        
      2128. 
      
        
    2128. 
          
          
              summary_stats[:unit_week_engagements] = task_engagements.where("task_engagements.engagement_time > :start AND task_engagements.engagement_time < :end", start: summary_stats[:week_start], end: summary_stats[:week_end]).count
        
      2129. 
      
        
    2129. 
          
          
              summary_stats[:revert_count] = 0
        
      2130. 
      
        
    2130. 
          
          
              summary_stats[:revert] = {}
        
      2131. 
      
        
    2131. 
          
          
              summary_stats[:staff] = {}
        
      2132. 
      
        
    2132. 
          
          
          
        
      2133. 
      
        
    2133. 
          
          
              days_to_end_of_unit = (end_date.to_date - DateTime.now).to_i
        
      2134. 
      
        
    2134. 
          
          
              days_from_start_of_unit = (DateTime.now - start_date.to_date).to_i
        
      2135. 
      
        
    2135. 
          
          
          
        
      2136. 
      
        
    2136. 
          
          
              return if days_from_start_of_unit < 4 || days_to_end_of_unit < 0
        
      2137. 
      
        
    2137. 
          
          
          
        
      2138. 
      
        
    2138. 
          
          
              staff.each do |ur|
        
      2139. 
      
        
    2139. 
          
          
                summary_stats[:revert][ur.user] = []
        
      2140. 
      
        
    2140. 
          
          
              end
        
      2141. 
      
        
    2141. 
          
          
          
        
      2142. 
      
        
    2142. 
          
          
              active_projects.each do |project|
        
      2143. 
      
        
    2143. 
          
          
                project.send_weekly_status_email(summary_stats, days_from_start_of_unit > 28 && days_to_end_of_unit > 14 )
        
      2144. 
      
        
    2144. 
          
          
              end
        
      2145. 
      
        
    2145. 
          
          
          
        
      2146. 
      
        
    2146. 
          
          
              summary_stats[:num_students_without_tutors] = active_projects.where(tutorial_id: nil).count
        
      2147. 
      
        
    2147. 
          
          
          
        
      2148. 
      
        
    2148. 
          
          
              staff.each do |ur|
        
      2149. 
      
        
    2149. 
          
          
                ur.populate_summary_stats(summary_stats)
        
      2150. 
      
        
    2150. 
          
          
              end
        
      2151. 
      
        
    2151. 
          
          
          
        
      2152. 
      
        
    2152. 
          
          
              staff.each do |ur|
        
      2153. 
      
        
    2153. 
          
          
                ur.send_weekly_status_email(summary_stats)
        
      2154. 
      
        
    2154. 
          
          
              end
        
      2155. 
      
        
    2155. 
          
          
          
        
      2156. 
      
        
    2156. 
          
          
              summary_stats[:staff] = {}
        
      2157. 
      
        
    2157. 
          
          
          
        
      2158. 
      
        
    2158. 
          
          
            end
        
      2159.

          class UnitRole < ActiveRecord::Base

            def self.for_user(user)
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
              UnitRole.joins(:role, :unit).where("user_id = :user_id and roles.name <> 'Student'", user_id: user.id)
        
      24.

            end

            def tasks_awaiting_feedback
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
              tasks.joins(:task_definition).where('projects.enrolled = TRUE AND projects.target_grade >= task_definitions.target_grade AND tasks.task_status_id = :status', status: TaskStatus.ready_to_mark)
        
      34.

            end

            def oldest_task_awaiting_feedback
        
      37.

              tasks_awaiting_feedback.order("submission_date ASC").first
        
      38. 
      
        
    38.

            def self.permissions
        
      44.

              # What can students do with unit roles?

              student_role_permissions = [

                :get

      48.

              # What can tutors do with unit roles?
        
      49.

            def populate_summary_stats(summary_stats)
        
      114. 
      
        
    114. 
          
          
          
        
      115. 
      
        
    115. 
          
          
              data = {}
        
      116. 
      
        
    116. 
          
          
          
        
      117. 
      
        
    117. 
          
          
              data[:staff] = user
        
      118. 
      
        
    118. 
          
          
              data[:unit_role] = self
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          
          
          
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          
          
              data[:engagements] = task_engagements.
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          
          
                where(
        
      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          
          
                  "task_engagements.engagement_time >= :start AND task_engagements.engagement_time < :end", 
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          
          
                  start: summary_stats[:week_start], end: summary_stats[:week_end])
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          
          
          
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          
          
              data[:total_engagements_count] = task_engagements.count
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          
          
              data[:weekly_engagements_count] = data[:engagements].count
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          
          
          
        
      128. 
      
        
    128. 
          
          
              if tasks_awaiting_feedback.count > 0
        
      129. 
      
        
    129. 
          
          
                data[:oldest_task_days] = (Time.zone.today - tasks_awaiting_feedback.order("submission_date ASC").first.submission_date.to_date).to_i
        
      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          
          
                data[:tasks_awaiting_feedback_count] = tasks_awaiting_feedback.count
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          
          
              else
        
      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          
          
                data[:oldest_task_days] = 0
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          
          
                data[:tasks_awaiting_feedback_count] = 0
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          
          
              end
        
      135. 
      
        
    135. 
          
          
          
        
      136. 
      
        
    136. 
          
          
              data[:number_of_students] = number_of_students
        
      137. 
      
        
    137. 
          
          
          
        
      138. 
      
        
    138. 
          
          
              data[:total_staff_engagements] = task_engagements.where(engagement: [TaskStatus.complete.name, TaskStatus.do_not_resubmit.name, TaskStatus.redo.name, TaskStatus.discuss.name, TaskStatus.demonstrate.name, TaskStatus.fail.name]).count
        
      139. 
      
        
    139. 
          
          
              data[:staff_engagements] = data[:engagements].where(engagement: [TaskStatus.complete.name, TaskStatus.do_not_resubmit.name, TaskStatus.redo.name, TaskStatus.discuss.name, TaskStatus.demonstrate.name, TaskStatus.fail.name]).count
        
      140. 
      
        
    140. 
          
          
          
        
      141. 
      
        
    141. 
          
          
              data[:received_comments] = comments.where("recipient_id = :staff_id AND task_comments.created_at > :start", staff_id: data[:staff].id, start: Time.zone.today - 7.days).count
        
      142. 
      
        
    142. 
          
          
              data[:sent_comments] = comments.where("task_comments.user_id = :staff_id AND task_comments.created_at > :start", staff_id: data[:staff].id, start: Time.zone.today - 7.days).count
        
      143. 
      
        
    143. 
          
          
              data[:total_comments] = comments.where("task_comments.user_id = :staff_id", staff_id: data[:staff].id).count
        
      144. 
      
        
    144. 
          
          
          
        
      145. 
      
        
    145. 
          
          
              summary_stats[:staff][self] = data
        
      146. 
      
        
    146. 
          
          
            end
        
      147. 
      
        
    147. 
          
          
          
        
      148. 
      
        
    148. 
          1
          
            def send_weekly_status_email(summary_stats)
        
      149. 
      
        
    149. 
          
          
              return unless user.receive_feedback_notifications
        
      150. 
      
        
    150. 
          
          
          
        
      151. 
      
        
    151. 
          
          
              NotificationsMailer.weekly_staff_summary(self, summary_stats).deliver_now
        
      152. 
      
        
    152. 
          
          
            end
        
      153. 
      
        
    153. 
          
          
          end

          class User < ActiveRecord::Base
        
      5.

          1
          
            include AuthenticationHelpers

      8.

            # Authentication

    9.

            # Auth token encryption settings
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          1
          
            attr_encrypted :auth_token,
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
                           key: Doubtfire::Application.secrets.secret_key_attr,
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          
          
                           encode: true,
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
                           attribute: 'authentication_token'
        
      16.

      17.

            # User authentication config
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          1
          
            if AuthenticationHelpers.aaf_auth?
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
              #
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
              # Decodes a JWS against the JWT secret, returning JWT data or nil if no data
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
              # could be decoded
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          
          
              #
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
              def self.decode_jws(jws)
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
                JSON::JWT.decode(jws.to_s, Doubtfire::Application.secrets.secret_key_aaf)
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          
          
              rescue
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
                nil
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
              end
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
          
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
              #
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
              # Validates a JSON web Signature against assertion rules. Returns false if
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
              # it could not be verified.
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
              #
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
              def valid_jwt?(jws)
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
                # 1. The signed JWT matches the JWT key
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
                jwt = User.decode_jws(jws)
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
                return false if jwt.nil?
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
                # 2. The `aud` claim matches the application URL
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
                aud_ok = jwt['aud'] == Doubtfire::Application.config.aaf[:audience_url]
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
                # 3. The `iss` claim has the correct issuer URL
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
                iss_ok = jwt['iss'] == Doubtfire::Application.config.aaf[:issuer_url]
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
                # 4. The time MUST >= nbf time and < exp claim
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
                time_ok = Time.zone.now >= Time.zone.at(jwt['nbf']) &&
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
                          Time.zone.now <  Time.zone.at(jwt['exp'])
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
                # Assert all
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
                aud_ok && iss_ok && time_ok
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
              end
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
            else
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          1
          
              devise_keys = %i(registerable recoverable rememberable trackable validatable)
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          1
          
              strategy = AuthenticationHelpers.ldap_auth? ? :ldap_authenticatable : :database_authenticatable
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          1
          
              devise strategy, *devise_keys
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
            end
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
          
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
            # 
        
      54. 
      
        
    54.

      55.

            def authenticate?(data)
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          9
          
              if aaf_auth?
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          
          
                valid_jwt?(data)
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          9
          
              elsif ldap_auth?
        
      75.

                valid_ldap_authentication?(data)
        
      76.

              else
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          9
          
                valid_password?(data)

              end
        
      79.

            def extend_authentication_token(remember)
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          
          
              # Extending a nil token will just create one first
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          91
          
              if auth_token.nil?
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          37
          
                generate_authentication_token! false
        
      88.

                return

      90. 
      
        
    90. 
          
          
          
        
      91. 
      
        
    91. 
          
          
              # Default expire time
        
      92.

          54
          
              expiry_time = Time.zone.now + 2.hours

      94. 
      
        
    94.

              if remember

    96. 
          12

    97. 
          12
          
                tutor_expiry_time = Time.zone.now + 1.week
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          12
          
                expiry_time =
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          
          
                  if role == Role.student || role == :student

                    student_expiry_time

            # Force-generates a new authentication token, regardless of whether or not

      115.

      116.

            def generate_authentication_token!(remember)
        
      117. 
      
        
    117. 
          
          
              # Loop until new unique auth token is found
        
      118. 
      
        
    118. 
          42
          
              token = loop do
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          42
          
                token = Devise.friendly_token
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          42
          
                break token unless User.find_by_auth_token(token)
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          
          
              end
        
      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          
          
              # Set and return new auth token
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          42
          
              self.auth_token = token
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          42
          
              extend_authentication_token(remember)
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          42
          
              save
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          42
          
              token
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          
          
            end
        
      128. 
      
        
    128. 
          
          
          
        
      129. 
      
        
    129. 
          
          
            #
        
      130. 
      
        
    130. 
          
          
            # Generate an authentication token that will expire in 30 seconds
        
      131. 
      
        
    131. 
          
          
            #
        
      132. 
      
        
    132. 
          1
          
            def generate_temporary_authentication_token!
        
      133. 
      
        
    133. 
          
          
              generate_authentication_token!(false)
        
      134. 
      
        
    134. 
          
          
              self.auth_token_expiry = Time.zone.now + 30.seconds
        
      135. 
      
        
    135.

      136.

            # Deletes authentication token
        
      139.

      140.

            def reset_authentication_token!
        
      141. 
      
        
    141. 
          1
          
              self.auth_token = nil
        
      142. 
      
        
    142. 
          1
          
              self.auth_token_expiry = Time.zone.now - 1.week
        
      143. 
      
        
    143. 
          1
          
              save
        
      144. 
      
        
    144. 
          
          
            end
        
      145.

            # Returns whether the authentication token has expired
        
      148.

      149.

          1
          
            def authentication_token_expired?
        
      150. 
      
        
    150. 
          5
          
              auth_token_expiry.nil? || auth_token_expiry <= Time.zone.now
        
      151. 
      
        
    151.

    163. 
          1
          
            validates :first_name,  presence: true
        
      164. 
      
        
    164. 
          1
          
            validates :last_name,   presence: true
        
      165. 
      
        
    165. 
          1
          
            validates :role_id,     presence: true
        
      166. 
      
        
    166. 
          1
          
            validates :username,    presence: true, uniqueness: { case_sensitive: false }
        
      167. 
      
        
    167. 
          1
          
            validates :email,       presence: true, uniqueness: { case_sensitive: false }, format: {with: /\A([^@\s]+)@((?:[-a-z0-9]+\.)+[a-z]{2,})\z/i}
        
      168. 
      
        
    168. 
          1
          
            validates :student_id,  uniqueness: true, allow_nil: true
        
      169. 
      
        
    169. 
          
          
          
        
      170. 
      
        
    170. 
          
          
            # Queries
        
      171. 
      
        
    171. 
          2
          
            scope :tutors,    -> { joins(:role).where('roles.id = :tutor_role or roles.id = :convenor_role or roles.id = :admin_role', tutor_role: Role.tutor_id, convenor_role: Role.convenor_id, admin_role: Role.admin_id) }
        
      172. 
      
        
    172. 
          2
          
            scope :convenors, -> { joins(:role).where('roles.id = :convenor_role or roles.id = :admin_role', convenor_role: Role.convenor_id, admin_role: Role.admin_id) }
        
      173. 
      
        
    173. 
          1
          
            scope :admins,    -> { joins(:role).where('roles.id = :admin_role', admin_role: Role.admin_id) }
        
      174. 
      
        
    174. 
          
          
          
        
      175. 
      
        
    175. 
          1
          
            def self.teaching(unit)
        
      176. 
      
        
    176. 
          
          
              User.joins(:unit_roles).where('unit_roles.unit_id = :unit_id and ( unit_roles.role_id = :tutor_role_id or unit_roles.role_id = :convenor_role_id) ', unit_id: unit.id, tutor_role_id: Role.tutor_id, convenor_role_id: Role.convenor_id)
        
      177. 
      
        
    177. 
          
          
            end
        
      178. 
      
        
    178. 
          
          
          
        
      179. 
      
        
    179. 
          1
          
            def username=(name)
        
      180. 
      
        
    180. 
          
          
              # strip S or s from start of ids in the form S1234567 or S123456X
        
      181. 
      
        
    181. 
          17
          
              truncate_s_match = (name =~ /^[Ss]\d{6,10}([Xx]|\d)$/)
        
      182. 
      
        
    182. 
          17
          
              name[0] = '' if !truncate_s_match.nil? && truncate_s_match.zero?
        
      183. 
      
        
    183. 
          17
          
              self[:username] = name.downcase
        
      184. 
      
        
    184. 
          
          
            end
        
      185. 
      
        
    185. 
          
          
          
        
      186. 
      
        
    186. 
          1
          
            def has_student_capability?
        
      187. 
      
        
    187. 
          
          
              true
        
      188. 
      
        
    188. 
          
          
            end
        
      189. 
      
        
    189. 
          
          
          
        
      190. 
      
        
    190. 
          1
          
            def has_tutor_capability?
        
      191. 
      
        
    191. 
          1
          
              role_id == Role.tutor_id || has_convenor_capability?
        
      192. 
      
        
    192. 
          
          
            end
        
      193. 
      
        
    193. 
          
          
          
        
      194. 
      
        
    194. 
          1
          
            def has_convenor_capability?
        
      195. 
      
        
    195. 
          1
          
              role_id == Role.convenor_id || has_admin_capability?
        
      196. 
      
        
    196. 
          
          
            end
        
      197. 
      
        
    197. 
          
          
          
        
      198. 
      
        
    198. 
          1
          
            def has_admin_capability?
        
      199. 
      
        
    199. 
          2
          
              role_id == Role.admin_id
        
      200. 
      
        
    200. 
          
          
            end
        
      201. 
      
        
    201. 
          
          
          
        
      202. 
      
        
    202. 
          1
          
            def self.get_change_role_perm_fn
        
      203. 
      
        
    203. 
          15
          
              lambda do |role, perm_hash, other|
        
      204. 
      
        
    204. 
          15
          
                from_role = other[0]
        
      205. 
      
        
    205. 
          15
          
                to_role = other[1]
        
      206. 
      
        
    206. 
          
          
          
        
      207. 
      
        
    207. 
          15
          
                (chg_roles = perm_hash[:change_role]) &&
        
      208. 
      
        
    208. 
          30
          
                  (role_hash = chg_roles[role]) &&
        
      209. 
      
        
    209. 
          15
          
                  (from_role_hash = role_hash[from_role]) &&
        
      210. 
      
        
    210. 
          
          
                  from_role_hash[to_role]
        
      211. 
      
        
    211. 
          
          
              end
        
      212. 
      
        
    212. 
          
          
            end
        
      213. 
      
        
    213. 
          
          
          
        
      214. 
      
        
    214. 
          
          
            #
        
      215. 
      
        
    215. 
          
          
            # Permissions around user data
        
      216. 
      
        
    216. 
          
          
            #
        
      217. 
      
        
    217. 
          1
          
            def self.permissions
        
      218. 
      
        
    218. 
          
          
              # Change role permissons:
        
      219. 
      
        
    219. 
          
          
              #   who can change a Doubtfire user's role?
        
      220. 
      
        
    220. 
          45
          
              change_role_permissions = {
        
      221. 
      
        
    221. 
          
          
                # The current_user's role is an Administrator
        
      222. 
      
        
    222. 
          
          
                admin: {
        
      223. 
      
        
    223. 
          
          
                  # User being assigned is an admin?
        
      224. 
      
        
    224. 
          
          
                  #   An admin current_user can demote them to either a student, tutor or convenor
        
      225. 
      
        
    225. 
          
          
                  admin: {     student: [ :demote_user  ],
        
      226. 
      
        
    226. 
          
          
                               tutor: [ :demote_user ],
        
      227. 
      
        
    227. 
          
          
                               convenor: [ :demote_user ] },
        
      228. 
      
        
    228. 
          
          
                  # User being assigned is a convenor?
        
      229. 
      
        
    229. 
          
          
                  #   An admin current_user can demote them to student or tutor
        
      230. 
      
        
    230. 
          
          
                  #   An admin current_user can promote them to an admin
        
      231. 
      
        
    231. 
          
          
                  convenor: {  student: [ :demote_user  ],
        
      232. 
      
        
    232. 
          
          
                               tutor: [ :demote_user  ],
        
      233. 
      
        
    233. 
          
          
                               admin: [ :promote_user ] },
        
      234. 
      
        
    234. 
          
          
                  # User being assigned is a tutor?
        
      235. 
      
        
    235. 
          
          
                  #   An admin current_user can demote them to a student
        
      236. 
      
        
    236. 
          
          
                  #   An admin current_user can promote them to a convenor or admin
        
      237. 
      
        
    237. 
          
          
                  tutor: {     student: [ :demote_user  ],
        
      238. 
      
        
    238. 
          
          
                               convenor: [ :promote_user ],
        
      239. 
      
        
    239. 
          
          
                               admin: [ :promote_user ] },
        
      240. 
      
        
    240. 
          
          
                  # User being assigned is a student?
        
      241. 
      
        
    241. 
          
          
                  #   An admin current_user can promote them to a tutor, convenor or admin
        
      242. 
      
        
    242. 
          
          
                  student: {   tutor: [ :promote_user ],
        
      243. 
      
        
    243. 
          
          
                               convenor: [ :promote_user ],
        
      244. 
      
        
    244. 
          
          
                               admin: [ :promote_user ] },
        
      245. 
      
        
    245. 
          
          
                  # User being assigned has no role?
        
      246. 
      
        
    246. 
          
          
                  #   An admin current_user can create user to any role
        
      247. 
      
        
    247. 
          
          
                  nil: {       student: [ :create_user  ],
        
      248. 
      
        
    248. 
          
          
                               tutor: [ :create_user  ],
        
      249. 
      
        
    249. 
          
          
                               convenor: [ :create_user ],
        
      250. 
      
        
    250. 
          
          
                               admin: [ :create_user  ] }
        
      251. 
      
        
    251. 
          
          
                },
        
      252. 
      
        
    252. 
          
          
                # The current_user's role is a Convenor
        
      253. 
      
        
    253. 
          
          
                convenor: {
        
      254. 
      
        
    254. 
          
          
                  # User being assigned is an tutor?
        
      255. 
      
        
    255. 
          
          
                  #   A convenor current_user can demote them to a student
        
      256. 
      
        
    256. 
          
          
                  tutor: {     student: [ :demote_user  ] },
        
      257. 
      
        
    257. 
          
          
                  # User being assigned is an student?
        
      258. 
      
        
    258. 
          
          
                  #   A convenor current_user can promote them to a student
        
      259. 
      
        
    259. 
          
          
                  student: {   tutor: [ :promote_user ] },
        
      260. 
      
        
    260. 
          
          
                  # User being assigned has no role?
        
      261. 
      
        
    261. 
          
          
                  #   A convenor current_user can create a user to either a student or tutor role
        
      262. 
      
        
    262. 
          
          
                  nil: {       student: [ :create_user  ],
        
      263. 
      
        
    263. 
          
          
                               tutor: [ :create_user  ] }
        
      264. 
      
        
    264. 
          
          
                }
        
      265. 
      
        
    265. 
          
          
              }
        
      266. 
      
        
    266. 
          
          
          
        
      267. 
      
        
    267. 
          
          
              # What can admins do with users?
        
      268. 
      
        
    268. 
          45
          
              admin_role_permissions = [
        
      269. 
      
        
    269. 
          
          
                :create_user,
        
      270. 
      
        
    270. 
          
          
                :upload_csv,
        
      271.

      272.

      273. 
      
        
    273. 
          
          
                :download_unit_csv,
        
      274.

      275. 
      
        
    275. 
          
          
                :create_unit,
        
      276. 
      
        
    276. 
          
          
                :act_tutor,
        
      277. 
      
        
    277. 
          
          
                :admin_units,
        
      278. 
      
        
    278. 
          
          
                :admin_users,
        
      279. 
      
        
    279. 
          
          
                :convene_units,
        
      280.

                :download_stats
        
      281.

      282. 
      
        
    282. 
          
          
          
        
      283. 
      
        
    283. 
          
          
              # What can convenors do with users?
        
      284. 
      
        
    284. 
          45
          
              convenor_role_permissions = [
        
      285. 
      
        
    285. 
          
          
                :promote_user,
        
      286. 
      
        
    286. 
          
          
                :list_users,
        
      287. 
      
        
    287.

      288.

                :update_user,
        
      289.

      290.

      291.

      293.

      294.

      296.

      297.
